src_text: people with comorbidities – such as asthma, hypertension, chronic kidney disease and diabetes – could experi ence more severe coro navirus (covid19) symptoms, and may even die as a result of the strain the virus puts on their bodies.
tgt_text: abantu abanezifo eziyimbelesela – njengesifuba somoya, umfutho wegazi ophakeme, izifo eziyimbelesela ezihambisana nezinso kanye nesifo sikashukela – bangahlangabezana nezimpawu zegciwane lecorona (icovid19) ezibucayi kakhulu, futhi bangafa nokufa ngenxa yengcindezi elethwa yileli gciwane emzimbeni yabo.

src_text: fortunately, when cape townbased occupational therapist and mother of three insaaf mohammed (40) tested positive for covid19 while ill with asthma, she was able to manage both conditions and did not become seriously ill. mohammed contracted covid19 from her husband, who works at the groote schuur hospital’s laboratory.
tgt_text: ngenhlanhla enkulu, ngesikhathi udokotela osebenza ekapa futhi ongumama wabantwana abathathu uinsaaf mohammed (oneminyaka engama40) uye wahlonzwa njengonegciwane lecorona (icovid19) kwelinye icala eguliswa yisifuba somoya, nokwazile ukulawula lezi zimo futhi ngaphandle kokugula okutheni.

src_text: mohammed’s sevenyearold son also tested positive.
tgt_text: umohammed usuleleke ngecovid19 eyithola kumkhwenyana wakhe, osebenza elebhu yesibhedlela igroote schuur.

src_text: after testing positive, all three selfisolated at home.
tgt_text: indodana kamohammed eneminyaka eyisikhombisa ubudala nayo ihlonzwe njengenegciwane.

src_text: "we selfisolated in our bedroom, while my motherinlaw – who has diabetes and hypertension and thankfully didn’t contract the virus – took care of our other two children," says mohammed.
tgt_text: emva kokuhlonzwa njengezisulu zegciwane lecorona, bobathathu babe sebehlala ngabodwana khona ekhaya labo.

src_text: according to the western cape department of health, people with hypertension, diabetes and chronic kidney disease are among the most common comorbidity sufferers of covid19.
tgt_text: "besihleli ngasodwana emagunjini ethu okulala, ngesikhathi umamezala wami onesifo sikashukela kanye nomfutho wegazi ophakeme kuyabongeka ukuthi yena akazange wesuleleka ngaleli gciwane – unakekele laba bantwana abanye ababili," kusho umohammed.

src_text: as of 25 may, people with the following comorbidities showed serious symptoms of covid19; hypertension, 58 percent diabetes, 56 percent chronic kidney disease, 17 percent hiv , 16 percent asthma or chronic respiratory disease, 15 percent cardiac disease, 11 percent obesity, 13 percent tb, 13 percent cancer, two percent other chronic illnesses, 16 percent.
tgt_text: ngokomnyango wezempilo wasentshonalanga kapa, abantu abanesifo somfutho wegazi, isifo sikashukela kanye nesifo esiyimbelesela sezinso bangabanye babantu abalinyazwa kakhulu yicovid19.

src_text: mohammed says her worst fear was experiencing serious respiratory complications from covid19.

src_text: "i experienced tiredness, coughing and tightness of the chest, which my asthma pump resolved.

src_text: my symptoms were not as severe as my husband’s, who had body aches, nausea, a tight chest, shortness of breath, blocked sinuses, thick phlegm on his chest and a fever.
tgt_text: "ngihlangabezane nokuhlala ngikhathele, ukukhwehlela kanye nokucinana kwesifuba, nokuye kwaxazululwa yisifutho sami sesifuba somoya.

src_text: the western cape department of health says that keeping hydrated and monitoring your blood glucose, blood pressure and temperature are key to managing covid19, especially for patients with comorbidities.
tgt_text: "umndeni wami ubuqonda, uzinakekela futhi wesekana, futhi ubusilethela ukudla kwakusihlwa, kodwa kwesinye isikhathi umphakathi wakho ungekhombise ukunakekela futhi nobuhlungu obenziwa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kuyethusa," kusho umohammed.

src_text: in addition, the department advises people with comorbidities to: take medication correct ly, as prescribed by your healthcare practitioner.

src_text: wash your hands with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, before you touch any medication.

src_text: now, more than ever, our friends, families, colleagues and neighbours need our empathy and support.
tgt_text: manje abangani bethu, nemindeni, ozakwethu kanye nomakhelwane bethu badinga ukuhawukelwa nokuthi sibazwele kakhulu kunakuqala.

src_text: in the days, weeks and months that lie ahead, we will at times find ourselves despondent and fearful as we see the numbers of people infected and dying continue to rise.
tgt_text: ezinsukwini, emasontweni nasezinyangeni eziseza, kuzoba nezikhathi esizozithola sixakekile futhi sesaba njengoba sibona isibalo sabantu abathelelekile nabashonayo sinyuka.

src_text: it may be that things have gotten worse, but we are certain that they will get better.
tgt_text: kungenzeka ukuthi izinto sezonakele kakhulu, kodwa sinesiqiniseko sokuthi zizoba ngcono.

src_text: our scientists and medical advisers told us that the rate of infections will go up as we move towards our peak.
tgt_text: ososayensi bethu kanye nabeluleki bezempilo basitshela ukuthi isibalo sabantu abathelelekayo sizonyuka njengoba siya esicongweni sesibalo sabathelelekayo.

src_text: but it will certainly come down.
tgt_text: kodwa sizokwehla nakanjani.

src_text: we pay tribute to the healthcare workers who lost their lives caring for the sick.
tgt_text: sihlonipha bonke abasebenzi basemkhakheni wezempilo abadlule emhlabeni ngenxa yokunakekela abagulayo.

src_text: in their memory, let us keep ourselves and our fellow citizens safe by playing our part.
tgt_text: njengoba sibakhumbula, masizigcine thina uqobo kanye nezinye izakhamuzi zakithi ziphephile ngokudlala eyethu indima.

src_text: we shall overcome this virus and rebuild our society.
tgt_text: sizolinqoba leli gciwane bese silakha kabusha izwe lethu.

src_text: we have seen darker times and we have prevailed.
tgt_text: sibuya ebumnyameni obudlula lokhu futhi esabunqoba ngempumelelo.

src_text: let us spare neither strength nor courage as we work together to save lives.
tgt_text: amazwi okuhlonipha abasebenzi basemkhakheni wezempilo vukuzenzele unnamed isibalo sakamuva sabantu asebedlulile emhla beni ngenxa yegciwane lecorona sesevile kuzi2000.

src_text: young farmer receives covid19 support vukuzenzele unnamed nomagcinandile suduka (27) is growing her family’s legacy and wealth by investing in agriculture.
tgt_text: umlimi omncane uthola uxhaso lwecovid19 silusapho nyanda umlimi osafufusa wasempumalanga kapa ungomunye wabahlomule kuxhasomali lukahulumeni lwegciwane lecorona.

src_text: the o wner of 4 u and 4 me primary cooperative in mooiplaas village received support from the department of agriculture, land reform and rural development’s coronavirus (covid19) relief fund for her egg, livestock and vegetable farm.
tgt_text: unomagcinandile suduka (one minyaka enga ma27) okhulisa ifa lomnde ni wakhe kanye nomcebo ngokutshala izimali zakhe kwezolimo.

src_text: the department has awarded r1.2 billion worth of vouchers to farmers in need.
tgt_text: umnikazi we4 u and 4 me primary cooperative esigodini sasemooiplaas uthole ukuxhaswa esikhwameni somnyango wezolimo, ukuguqulwa komhlaba noku thuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya segciwane lecorona (icovid19) ngepulazi lakhe lamaqanda, imfuyo kanye nezitshalo.

src_text: suduka says her vouchers will help her grow the egg producing side of her business.
tgt_text: umnyango usukhiphe isi gidigidi esir1.2 samavawu sha kubalimi abawadingayo.

src_text: "i received three vouchers totalling r19 000. a voucher for r12 000 to buy layer egg chickens, a voucher for r6 500 to buy feed and a r500 voucher to buy medicines.
tgt_text: usuduka uthi amavawusha akhe azomsiza ukukhulisa umkhiqizo wakhe wamaqanda ebhizinisini lakhe.

src_text: "she started her egg production farm by feeding her family’s traditional chickens with layer grower feed, which enables them to produce eggs without mating.
tgt_text: "ngithole amavawusha amathathu ayisamba esiyizir19 000. ivawusha yezir12 000 yokuthenga izinkukhu zamaqanda eziyi100, ivawusha yezir6 500 yokuthenga ukudla kwezi nkukhu kanye nevawusha yamar500 yokuthenga imithi.

src_text: her chickens now produce 50 eggs a day, which she sells weekly.
tgt_text: "waqala ipulazi lokukhiqiza amaqanda ngokuphakela izinkukhu zomndeni wakhe ukudla kokukhulisa izinkukhu, okwenza ukuthi zikhiqize amaqanda ngaphandle kokukhwelana.

src_text: suduka, who also farms with 73 goats, 25 sheep and 25 cows, started farming in 2015 after obtaining a public management n6 certificate from ikhala training and vocational education and training college.
tgt_text: izinkukhu zakhe ezingama50 manje sezikhiqiza amaqanda angama50 ngosuku, akawadayisa njalo ngeviki.

src_text: after realising that there were not a lot of job opportunities out there, she decided to take over the family’s then subsistence farm and turn it into a profitable business.
tgt_text: usuduka, ophinde afuye izimbuzi ezingama73, izimvu ezingama25 nezinkomo ezingama25, waqala ukuba umlimi ngonyaka wezi2015 emva kokuthola isitifiketi sezifundo zepublic manage ment sakwan6 esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme eikhala training and vocational edu cation and training college .

src_text: suduka says: "we grew up practising farming, so after graduating i decided to farm rather than look for a job."
tgt_text: emva kokubona ukuthi awekho amathuba amaningi omsebenzi, wanquma ukutha tha ipulazi elalihlala umndeni wakhe ngaleso sikhathi waliguqula laba ibhizinisi elingenisa imali.

src_text: this proved to be an inspired decision, as she has grown the number of goats and cows.
tgt_text: usuduka uthi: "sikhule silima, ngakhoke emva kokuthola iziqu nganquma ukuthi ngilime kunokufuna umsebenzi."

src_text: suduka’s sixhectare vegetable farm produces maize, potatoes, peas and beans.
tgt_text: lokhu kutshengisa ukuba isinqumo esihle kakhulu, njengoba esekhulise izimbuzi nezinkomo eziningi.

src_text: the maize is planted on four hectares, the potatoes on one hectare and the peas and beans share the last hectare.
tgt_text: ipulazi likasuduka elinga mahektha ayisithupha lezitshalo likhiqiza ummbila, amazambane, uphizi nobh ontshisi.

src_text: suduka has learnt a lot from covid19, especially that her best assets are her hands and hard work.
tgt_text: ummbila utshalwe kumahektha amane, amazambane kwelilodwa bese uphizi nobhontshisi utshalwe kwi hektha lokugcina.

src_text: tips on how to start a garden: make sure you know which plants your soil will support.
tgt_text: usuduka usefunde lukhulu kucovid19, ikakhulukazi uku thi amathuluzi ahamba phambili yizandla zakhe kanye nokusebenza kanzima.

src_text: ready your garden by first ploughing the land more than once without planting.
tgt_text: umlimi omncane uthola uxhaso lwecovid19 silusapho nyanda umlimi osafufusa wasempumalanga kapa ungomunye wabahlomule kuxhasomali lukahulumeni lwegciwane lecorona.

src_text: south africa acts to address ventilator shortage silusapho nyanda a locally developed ventilator will help patients with mild covid19 symptoms to breathe easier.
tgt_text: iningizimu afrika yenza umnyakazo wokubhekana nokuntuleka kwemishini yokuphefumula silusapho nyanda impi yokulwa nesifo segciwane lecorona (icovid19) eningizimu afrika seyiqinisiwe njengoba sibona umshini wokuphefumula wokuqala owenziwe kuleli.

src_text: the fight against the coronavirus disease (covid19) in south africa has been boosted with the production of the first ventilator made in the country.
tgt_text: umshini wokuphefumula ebizwa ngecontinuous positive airway pressure (icpap) usiza iziguli ezinezimpawu zecovid19 ezilingene zikwazi ukuphefumula kalula ngokuzihlinzeka ngomfutho olingene womoyampilo ozosiza ukugcina imigudu yomoya ivulekile.

src_text: the continuous positive airway pressure (cpap) ventilator helps patients with mild symptoms of covid19 to breathe easier by providing a mild level of oxygenated air pressure to keep their airways open.
tgt_text: umshini wokuphefumula wakhiwe ngokubambisana ngumkhandlu wocwaningo lwezesayensi nezimboni (icsir) nabalingani abaningana esebenzisana nabo kulo mkhakha futhi izosatshalaliswa ezweni lonke ezigulini ezikhombisa ukuba nengcindezi yokuphefumula esigabeni sokuqala sokutheleleka ngecovid19.

src_text: the ventilator was designed by the council for scientific and industrial research (csir) in collaboration with a number of local partners and will be rolled out nationwide to patients showing respiratory distress in the early phase of covid19 infection.
tgt_text: ngokuvamile umoya ophefumulwa umuntu unamaphesenti angama23 omoya ohlanzekile.

src_text: "the air a person normally breaths has a 23 percent concentration of oxygen.
tgt_text: umshini wokuphefumula wecpap ukwazi ukumpompa izinga elingaphezulu kwalokho lomoyampilo, nokusiza umuntu akwazi imishini yokuphefumula ekhiqizwe kuleli izosiza iziguli zecovid19 ezingenamandla zikwazi ukuphefumula kangconywana.

src_text: the cpap ventilator can pump a higher amount of oxygen, helping a person breathe.
tgt_text: phefumula.

src_text: the cpap pumps continuous concentrated oxygen.
tgt_text: ophampu becpap bampompa umoyampilo ngokuqhubekayo.

src_text: you can increase or decrease the amount of oxygen one is breathing in," says executive manager of csir future production: manufacturing martin sanne.
tgt_text: linganyuswa noma lehliswe inani lomoyampilo umuntu awuphefumulayo," kusho isikhulu esingumphathi omkhulu ecsir future production: manufacturing, umartin sanne.

src_text: patients using the ventilator are connected via a face mask.
tgt_text: iziguli ezisebenzisa umshini wokuphefumula uxhunywe kusetshenziswa isimfonyo sobuso.

src_text: oxygen is drawn from an oxygen gas tank and is mixed with natural air in the ventilator, from where it is transmitted to the mask and breathed in by the patient.
tgt_text: umoyampilo udonswa ethangini lomoyampilo oxutshwe nomoya wemvelo kumshini wokuphefumula lapho uthunyelwa khona kusimfonyo bese uphefumulwa yisiguli.

src_text: sanne says that in addition to pumping oxygenated air, the cpap also helps patients exhale.
tgt_text: usanne uthi phezu kokumpontshwa komoya onomoyampilo, icpap iphinde ilekelele iziguli zikwazi nokuwukhipha umoya.

src_text: the cpap device can be used in both hightech clinical environments and temporary settings, such as field hospitals and quarantine facilities.
tgt_text: icpap iyinsiza engasetshenziswa ezindaweni zobuchwepheshe obuseqophelweni eliphezulu iphinde ikwazi nokusetshenziswa ezikhungweni eziyizibhedlela zesikhashana nalapho kuhluswe khona abantu.

src_text: sanne says the csir will have produced 10 000 ventilators by the end of august.
tgt_text: usanne uthi icsir izobe seyikhiqize imishini yokuphefumula eyizi10 000 ekupheleni kukancwaba.

src_text: working with siemens, simera, akacia, gabler, umoya and the university of cape town, the csir produced the cpap according to world health organisation standards.
tgt_text: ngokusebenzisana nesiemens, isimera, iakacia, igabler, iumoya nenyuvesi yasekapa, icsir ikhiqize icpap ngokwamazinga abekwe yinhlangano yezempilo yomhlaba.

src_text: the first batch of ventilators will be given to state hospitals experiencing pressure due to the unavailability of equipment to deal with covid19.
tgt_text: iqoqo lokuqala lemishini yokuphefumula lizonikezwa izibhedlela zikahulumeni ezibhekene nengcindezi ngenxa yokuntuleka kwezinsizakusebenza nemishini ekwazi ukulwa necovid19.

src_text: the csir started working on the cpap after the world began experiencing an extreme shortage in ventilators.
tgt_text: icsir yaqala ukwakha icpap emuva kokuba umhlaba uqale ukubhekana nokuntuleka okukhulu kwemishini yokuphefumula.

src_text: "around march and april, there suddenly became a short supply of ventilators from our international suppliers.
tgt_text: "cishe ngondasa nombasa, kwaba nokuntuleka kwemishini yokuphefumula obekungazelelwe kubahlinzeki bethu bamazwe omhlaba.

src_text: where you could get them, they were very expensive so government issued a tender for the production of ventilators," says sanne.
tgt_text: uma ikhona indawo owawukwazi ukuyithola khona, yayimba eqolo kakhulu ngakho uhulumeni wakhipha ithenda yokukhiqiza le mishini yokuphefumula," kusho usanne.

src_text: the tender was part of the government’s national ventilator project within the department of trade, industry and competition.
tgt_text: leli thenda beliyingxenye yephrojekthi kahulumeni yemishini yokuphefumula kuzwelonke ngaphakathi komnyango wezohwebo, ezezimboni kanye nokuncintisana.

src_text: the csir is also working on a bilevel positive airway pressure ventilator aimed at helping patients with more severe symptoms of covid19.
tgt_text: omunye umsebenzi wecsir wukwakha umshini wokuphefumula womfutho omigudumibili phecelezi ibilevel positive airway pressure okuhloswe ngawo ukusiza iziguli ezinezimpawu zecovid19 ezibucayi.

src_text: the ventilator will assist with both inhalation and exhalation, either in fixed pressure modes or by sensing the oxygen supply required by a patient and adjusting the pressure accordingly.
tgt_text: iningizimu afrika yenza umnyakazo wokubhekana nokuntuleka kwemishini yokuphefumula silusapho nyanda impi yokulwa nesifo segciwane lecorona (icovid19) eningizimu afrika seyiqinisiwe njengoba sibona umshini wokuphefumula wokuqala owenziwe kuleli.

src_text: help stop the spread of covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed our nation is con fronted by the gravest crisis in the history of our democracy.
tgt_text: siza ukunqanda ukusabalala kwecovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed izwe lethu libhekene nensambatheka engakaze ibonwe emlandweni wethu wonke wentandoyeningi labantu.

src_text: for more than 120 days, we have succeeded in delaying the spread of a virus that is causing devastation across the globe.
tgt_text: ezinsukwini ezingaphezu kweziyi120, sesiphumelele ukukulibazisa nokho ukudlondlobala kwaleli gciwane eselidale umonakalo omkhulu emhlabenijikelele.

src_text: but now, the surge in infections that we had been advised by our medical experts would come, has arrived.
tgt_text: kodwa manje, ukudlondlobala kwesibalo sabantu abanegciwane esasitshelwe ngako yizazi zezempilo, sekuphezu kwethu.

src_text: more than a quarter of a million south africans have been infected with coronavirus, and we know that many more infections have gone undetected.
tgt_text: abantu baseningizimu afrika abangaphezu kwekota lesigidi sebetheleleke ngegciwane lecorona, futhi siyazi ukuthi baningi abanye abatheleleke ngalo leli gciwane kodwa abangabonakali.

src_text: we are now recording over 12,000 new cases every day.
tgt_text: njengamanje njalo ngosuku sithola abantu abangaphezu kwezi12,000 abanaleli gciwane.

src_text: since the start of the outbreak in march, at least 4,079 people have died from covid19.
tgt_text: kusukela ekuqaleni kwalo mbhedukazwe ngondasa, okungenani abantu abayizi4,079 sebebulewe yigciwane lecovid19.

src_text: like the massive cold fronts that sweep into our country from the south atlantic at this time of year, there are few parts of the country that will remain untouched by the coronavirus.
tgt_text: njengoba izingxenye ezithile zezwe lethu zihlaselwe isimo sezulu esiletha amakhaza ashubisa umnkantsha eqhamuka ngasolwandle lweantilathikhi kulesi sikhathi sonyaka, kunezinye izingxenye ezimbalwa zezwe ezingeke zichaphazelwe yileli gciwane lecorona.

src_text: the coronavirus storm is far fiercer and more destructive than any we have known before.
tgt_text: isichotho secorona sinamandla amakhulu futhi senza umonakalo ongaphezu kweminye esake sayibona ngaphambilini.

src_text: it is stretching our resources and our resolve to their limits.
tgt_text: lokhu kuyaziqeda izinsizakalo zethu kanjalo namandla ethu okuphikelela aya ngokuya esiphelela.

src_text: the surge of infections that our experts and scientists predicted over 3 months ago has now arrived.
tgt_text: ukudlondlobala kwamanani abantu abatheleleke ngegciwane ososayensi ababesixwayise ngako esikhathini sezinyanga ezingaphezu kwezi3 ezidlule sekusificile.

src_text: it started in the western cape and is now underway in the eastern cape and gauteng.
tgt_text: kwaqala entshonalanga kapa kanti kuyaqhubeka empumalanga kapa nasegauteng.

src_text: yet, while infections rise exponentially, it is important to note that our case fatality rate of 1.5 percent is among the lowest in the world.
tgt_text: yize noma, izibalo zabantu abatheleleke ngegciwane zikhula ngamandla, kusemqoka ukuqaphela ukuthi izinga lokudlula kwabantu emhlabeni eliyiphesenti eyi1.5 lingelinye laphansi kakhulu emhlabeni.

src_text: this is compared to a global average case fatality rate of 4.4 percent.
tgt_text: lokhu kuqhathaniswa nezinga lokudlula kwabantu emhlabeni elingamaphesenti ayi4.4.

src_text: we owe the relatively low number of deaths in our country to the experience and dedication of our health professionals and the urgent measures we have taken to build the capacity of our health system.
tgt_text: ukuba kwethu nezibalo eziphansi zabantu abadlulayo emhlabeni kungenxa yesipiliyoni nokuzinikela kwabasebenzi bethu bezempilo kanjalo nezinyathelo ezathathwa ngokushesha esasisophe ngazo ukulungiselela umkhakha wethu wezempilo uma sekwehla le nhlekelele futhi sizihlomise ngezinsiza esizidingayo.

src_text: even as most of our people have taken action to prevent the spread of the virus, there are others who have not.
tgt_text: nakuba abantu bethu abaningi benze imizamo yokuvikela igciwane, bakhona abanye abangazange bazihluphe.

src_text: there are some among us who ignore the regulations that have been passed to combat the disease.
tgt_text: bakhona abanye phakathi kwethu abangazigqizi qakala izimiso nemithetho ebekiwe ukuze sizame ukuqeda lesi sifo.

src_text: in the midst of such a pandemic, getting into a taxi without a face mask, gathering to meet friends, attending parties or even visiting family, can too easily spread the virus and cost lives.
tgt_text: phakathi kwalolu bhubhane olunje, ukugibela nje itekisi ngaphandle kwesimfonyo sobuso ukuhlangana njengabangani, ukuhamba imicimbi yobumnandi noma ukuvakashela umndeni, kungasabalalisa igciwane kalula kusimuke izimpilo zabantu.

src_text: this may be a disease that is caused by a virus, but it is spread by human conduct and behaviour.
tgt_text: lesi kungaba yisifo esibangwa yigciwane, kodwa sisatshalaliswa yindlela abantu abaziphatha nabaphila ngayo.

src_text: through our own actions – as individuals, as families, as communities – we can and we must change the course of this pandemic in our country.
tgt_text: ngezenzo zethu – njengabantu ngabodwana, njengemindeni, nemiphakathi – singakwazi futhi kumele siguqule isivinini ohamba ngaso lo mbulalazwe ezweni lethu.

src_text: we need to wear a cloth mask that covers our nose and mouth whenever we leave home.
tgt_text: kufanele sifake isimfonyo sobuso sendwangu esimboza ikhala nomlomo njalo lapho siphuma emakhaya ethu.

src_text: we must continue to regularly wash our hands with soap and water or sanitiser.
tgt_text: kufanele siqhubeke nokugeza izandla zethu njalonjalo ngensipho namanzi noma ngesibulalimagciwane.

src_text: we must continue to clean and sanitise all surfaces in all public spaces.
tgt_text: kufanele siqhubeke nokuhlanza zonke izindawo ezisobala ezindaweni ezisetshenziswa abantu abaningi.

src_text: most importantly, we must keep a safe distance – of at least 2 metres – from other people.
tgt_text: okubaluleke kakhulu, kufanele sigcine kunegebe eliphephile phakathi kwethu nabanye abantu – okungenani ibanga elingamamitha amabili – kwabanye abantu.

src_text: there is now emerging evidence that the virus may also be carried in tiny particles in the air in places that are crowded, closed or have poor air circulation.
tgt_text: manje sekunobufakazi obuvelayo bokuthi leli gciwane lingase futhi lisabalale nangezinhlayiya ezincane ezihamba emoyeni ezindaweni ezinezixuku zabantu, ezivalekile noma ezingakhiphi umoya ngendlela efanele.

src_text: for this reason we must immediately improve the indoor environment of public places where the risk of infection is greatest.
tgt_text: ngenxa yalesi sizathu kufanele siphangise ukuphucula isimo sangaphakathi sezindawo ezisetshenziswa umphakathi lapho ubungozi bokutheleleka bubukhulu kakhulu khona.

src_text: our decision to declare a nationwide lockdown prevented a massive early surge of infections when our health services were less prepared, which would have resulted in a far greater loss of lives.
tgt_text: isinqumo sethu sokumemezela ukuvalwa kwezwe lonke savikela ukuqubuka ngamandla kwesifo ngenkathi umkhakha wethu wezempilo ungakalungiselelwa, nobekungaholela ekudluleni kwabantu abaningi emhlabeni.

src_text: in the time that we had, we have taken important measures to strengthen our health response.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi ebesinaso, sithathe izinyathelo ezibalulekile zokuhlomisa umkhakha wethu wezempilo ukuze ukwazi ukubhekana nalolu bhubhane.

src_text: we have conducted more than two million coronavirus tests and community health workers have done more than 20 million screenings.
tgt_text: sesenze ukuhlolwa kwegciwane lecorona okungaphezu kwezigidi ezimbili kanti abasebenzi bezempilo bomphakathi sebenze ukuhlungwa kweziguli okungaphezu kwezigidi ezingama20.

src_text: we have made available almost 28,000 hospital beds for covid19 patients and have constructed functional field hospitals across the country.
tgt_text: sithole imibhede yezibhedlela ebalelwa kweziyi28,000 yeziguli zecovid19 futhi sesakhe ngempumelelo izibhedlela zesikhashana ezweni lonkana.

src_text: we now have over 37,000 quarantine beds in private and public facilities across the country, ready to isolate those who cannot do so at home.
tgt_text: njengamanje sinemibhede engaphezu kweziyi37,000 ezikhungweni zokugonqisa abantu embonini yezempilo ezimele neyomphakathi, elungele ukwamukela abantu abangakwazi ukuhlala ngabodwana emakhaya.

src_text: we have procured and delivered millions of items of personal protective equipment to hospitals, clinics and schools across the country to protect our frontline workers.
tgt_text: sithole futhi sathumela izimpahla eziyizigidi eziyizinsiza zokuzivikela ezibhedlela, emitholampilo nasezikoleni ezweni lonke ukuze sivikele abasebenzi bethu abangamabutho ayibambe ophondweni.

src_text: we have recruited and continue to recruit additional nurses, doctors and emergency health personnel.
tgt_text: siqashe futhi siyaqhubeka nokuqasha abahlengikazi abengeziwe, odokotela nabasebenzi abasebenza ophikweni lwezimo eziphuthumayo.

src_text: we continue to make progress in our efforts to deal with covid 19, but our greatest challenge still lies ahead.
tgt_text: siyaqhubeka nokwenza inqubekelaphambili emizamweni yethu yokubhekana necovid19, kepha inselele yethu enkulu isasimele ngaphambili.

src_text: across all provinces, we are working to further increase the number of general ward and critical beds available for covid19 patients.
tgt_text: kuzo zonke izifundazwe, sisebenzela ukwandisa isibalo samagumbi ezimo ezijwayelekile kanye nemibhede yeziguli zecovid19 ezisesimweni esibucayi.

src_text: ward capacity is being freed up in a number of hospitals by delaying nonurgent care, the conversion of some areas of hospitals into additional ward space and the erection or expansion of field hospitals.
tgt_text: umthamo omumathwa yigumbi lasesibhedlela uyandiswa ezibhedlela eziningi ngokubambezela ukunakekelwa kweziguli ezingadingi usizo oluphuthumayo, ukuguqulwa kwezinye izindawo zasezibhedlela zibe amawadi engeziwe kanjalo nokwakhiwa noma ukunwetshwa kwezibhedlela zesikhashana.

src_text: we are working to increase supplies of oxygen, ventilators and other equipment for those who will need critical care, including by diverting the supply of oxygen from other purposes.
tgt_text: sisebenzela ukwandisa izinsiza zokuhlinzeka ngomoyampilo, imishini yokuphefumula neminye imishini kulabo abadinga ukunakekelwa okubucayi, kubandakanya ukuphambukisa usizo ngomoyampilo kwezinye izindawo ubhekiswe ezigulini zecovid19.

src_text: we are deploying digital technologies to strengthen the identification, tracing and isolation of contacts, and to provide support to those who test positive.
tgt_text: sisebenzisa ubuchwepheshe bedijithali ukuqinisa ukuhlonzwa, ukuthungathwa kanye nokuhlaliswa ngabodwana kwabantu abake bahlangana nabantu abanegciwane, kanjalo nokuhlinzeka ngokwesekwa kulabo abathola imiphumela ebika ukuthi banalo igciwane.

src_text: as we now approach the peak of infections, we need to take extra precautions and tighten existing measures to slow down the rate of transmission.
tgt_text: njengoba manje sesisondele kuvuthondaba lokutheleleka kwabantu ngaleli gciwane, sidinga ukucophelela kakhulu ekulandeleni izinyathelo zokuphepha futhi siqinise izinyathelo ezikhona ukuze sehlisa izinga lokuthelelana ngegciwane.

src_text: regulations on the wearing of masks will be strengthened.
tgt_text: izimiso ezibekiwe mayelana nokufakwa kwezimfonyo zizoqiniswa.

src_text: employers, shop owners and managers, public transport operators, and managers and owners of any other public building are now legally obliged to ensure that anyone entering their premises or vehicle must be wearing a mask.
tgt_text: abaqashi, abaninizitolo nabaphathi, abasebenza ngezithuthi zomphakathi, nabaphathi kanye nabanikazi banoma yisiphi isakhiwo somphakathi manje baphoqelekile ngokomthetho ukuthi baqinisekise ukuthi noma ngubani ongena emagcekeni abo noma ezimotweni zabo ungena efake isimfonyo.

src_text: taxis undertaking local trips will now be permitted to increase their capacity to 100 percent, while long distance taxis will not be allowed to exceed 70 percent occupancy, on condition that new risk mitigation protocols related to masks, vehicle sanitising and open windows are followed.
tgt_text: amatekisi athatha uhambo endaweni manje azovunyelwa ukuthi enyuse isibalo sabagibeli bagcwale itekisi, kanti lapho abathatha uhambo lwamabanga amade ngeke bavunyelwe ukuthatha isibalo esevile kumaphesenti angama70, futhi inqobo uma kulandelwe imigomo emisha yokunciphisa ubungozi ehlobene nezimfonyo, ukuhlanzwa kwetekisi ngezibulalimagciwane kanye nokuvulwa kwamafasitela.

src_text: there is now clear evidence that the resumption of alcohol sales has resulted in substantial pressure being put on hospitals, including trauma and icu units, due to motor vehicle accidents, violence and related trauma.
tgt_text: sekunobufakazi obucacile bokuthi ukuvulwa kabusha kokuthengiswa kotshwala kulethe ingcindezi enkulu ezibhedlela, kubandakanya amayunithi ezinhlekelele nalawo abagula kakhulu, ngenxa yezingozi zezimoto, udlame kanye nokulimala okuhlobene notshwala.

src_text: we have therefore decided that in order to conserve hospital capacity, the sale, dispensing and distribution of alcohol will be suspended with immediate effect.
tgt_text: ngakhoke sinqume ukuthi ukuze sigcine isibalo sabangeniswa ezibhedlela silawuleka, ukudayiswa, ukukhishwa nokusatshalaliswa kotshwala kuzomiswa kusuka manje.

src_text: as an additional measure to reduce the pressure on hospitals, a curfew will be put in place between the hours of 9pm and 4am.
tgt_text: njengesinyathelo esengeziwe sokunciphisa ingcindezi ezibhedlela, kuzobekwa umnqamulajuqu wesikhathi okuvunyelwe ngaso ukuba ngaphandle kwamakhaya phakathi kwehora lesi9 ebusuku nehora lesi4 ekuseni.

src_text: we are taking these measures fully aware that they impose unwelcome restrictions on people’s lives.
tgt_text: sithatha lezi zinyathelo sazi kamhlophe ukuthi zibeka imingcele engathandeki ezimpilweni zabantu.

src_text: they are, however, necessary to see us through the peak of the disease.
tgt_text: kodwake, ziyadingeka, ukuze sikwazi ukuphepha kulesi sikhathi esiwuvuthondaba lwalolu bhubhane.

src_text: there is no way that we can avoid the coronavirus storm.

src_text: but we can limit the damage that it can cause to our lives.
tgt_text: kodwa singawubeka umkhawulo esingawudala ezimpilweni zethu.

src_text: as a nation we have come together to support each other, to provide comfort to those who are ill and to promote acceptance of people living with the virus.
tgt_text: njengesizwe sihlangane ndawonye ukuze selekelelane, siduduze labo abagulayo futhi sikhuthaze ukwamukelwa kwabantu abaphila naleli gciwane.

src_text: now, more than ever, we are responsible for the lives of those around us.
tgt_text: manje kakhulu kunakuqala, kusezandleni zethu ukusindisa izimpilo zalabo esiphila nabo.

src_text: we will weather this storm.
tgt_text: sizodlula lesi sichotho.

src_text: we will restore our country to health and to prosperity.
tgt_text: sizolakha kabusha izwe lethu liphinde libe yizwe elinempilo nelichumile.

src_text: we shall overcome.
tgt_text: siza ukunqanda ukusabalala kwecovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed izwe lethu libhekene nensambatheka engakaze ibonwe emlandweni wethu wonke wentandoyeningi labantu.

src_text: celebrating women through economic inclusion vukuzenzele unnamed in august south africa celebrates women’s month.
tgt_text: ukubungazwa kwabesifazane ukubungazwa kwabesifazane ngokubabandakanya kwezomnothongokubabandakanya kwezomnotho vukuzenzele unnamed ngoncwaba iningizi mu afrika ibungaza inyanga yabesifazane.

src_text: this occasion marks the anniversary of the day in 1956 when 20,000 women marched to the union buildings – a great sea of womankind speaking many languages, from different places and of all races.
tgt_text: lo mgubho uyisikhumbuzo sosuku enyakeni we1956 lapho abesifazane abayizi20 000 bamashela ezindlini zombuso – isixuku sabesifazane abakhuluma izilimi eziningi, abaphuma ezindaweni ezehlukene futhi babobonke ubuhlanga.

src_text: they were united in their demand for an end to the dreaded pass laws and for their right to live in freedom.
tgt_text: babebumbene ezimfunweni zabo zokuqedwa nya kwemithetho emibi yokuphathwa kwamapasi kanye nelungelo labo lokuphila ngenkululeko.

src_text: the status and position of women in south africa today is vastly different to that faced by our mothers and grandmothers in 1956. we have come a long way in realising a south africa that is nonracial, nonsexist, democratic, prosperous and free.
tgt_text: isimo nalapho abesifazane eni ngizimu afrika abakhona namuhla sehluke kakhulu kunaleso esasibhekene nomama kanye nogogo bethu ngowe1956.

src_text: there has been real progress in improving the lives of south african women in the economy, in the political sphere and in public life.
tgt_text: sesibuya kude kakhulu ukuze sifinyelele kwiningizimu afrika engenabuhlanga, engenabulili, yentando yeningi, ephumelelayo futhi ekhululekile.

src_text: at the same time, we know there is so much further we still have to go.
tgt_text: sekube nenqubekelaphambili ebonakalayo ekwenzeni ngcono izimpilo zabesifazane baseningizimu afrika kwezomnotho, kwezepolitiki kanye nasempilweni yomphakathi.

src_text: women still face discrimination, harassment and violence, and bear the greatest brunt of poverty.
tgt_text: ngaso leso sikhathi, siyazi ukuthi kusekuningi okusamele sikwenze.

src_text: if we are to truly realise the promise of our constitution we have to tackle the economic and financial exclusion that makes women more vulnerable to abuse and violence.
tgt_text: abesifazane basabhekana nokucwaswa, ukuhlukunyezwa kanye nodlame, futhi babhekane ngqo nobumpofu.

src_text: we have joined a groundbreaking campaign that links us to global efforts to achieve gender equality by 2030. generation equality is an ambitious and transformative agenda to end discrimination and violence against women and for their equal participation in political, social and economic life.
tgt_text: uma sizosifeza ngempela isithembiso somthethosisekelo wethu kumele sibhekane nokubekwa eceleni kwezomnotho nasezimalini okwenza abesifazane babe buthaka kakhulu ekuhlukunyezweni nasodlameni.

src_text: as part of this campaign, we have joined two ‘action coalitions’, one for economic justice and rights and another against genderbased violence.
tgt_text: sesihlanganyele emkhankasweni oyingqophamlando osihla nganisa nemizamo yomhlaba jikelele ukuzuza ukulingana ngokobulili ngonyaka wezi2030.

src_text: both of these themes are critical to our own national agenda.
tgt_text: ukulingana kwesizukulwana kuluhlelo olunezifiso nezinguquko oluzoqeda ukucwaswa nodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane kanye nokubandakanywa kwabo okulinganayo empilweni yezepolitiki, yezenhlalo kanye nomnotho.

src_text: eleven months since the emergency response action plan to combat genderbased violence and femicide was implemented we have made progress in expanding support and care to survivors, and progress is being made in legal reforms to afford them greater protection.
tgt_text: njengengxenye yalo mkhankaso, sesihlangane ‘nemifelandawonye’ emibili, owodwa wezobulungiswa kwezomnotho namalungelo kanye nomunye olwisana nodlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile.

src_text: during the month of august, we begin the implementation of the national strategic plan to combat genderbased violence and femicide.
tgt_text: zombili lezi zingqikithi zibaluleke kakhulu ohlelweni lwethu lukazwelonke.

src_text: a key aspect of the plan is on ensuring greater women’s financial inclusion.
tgt_text: ezinyangeni ezilishumi nanye kusuka uhlelo oluphuthumayo lomabizwasabele lokuqeda udlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile nokubulawa kwabesifazane lwaqalwa sekube nenqubekelaphambili ekusabalaliseni ukweseka nokunakekela labo abasindile, inqubekelaphambili iyabonakala kwezomthetho ukubanika ukuvikeleka okuthe xaxa.

src_text: this is because economic inequality and social inequality are interconnected.
tgt_text: ngenyanga kancwaba, siqalisa ukusebenza kohlelo lwamasu kazwelonke ukulwisana nodlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile nokubulawa kwabesifazane.

src_text: the economic status of women in south africa makes them more vulnerable to abuse.
tgt_text: okubaluleke kakhulu kulolu hlelo kusekuqinisekiseni ukubandakanyeka okukhulu kwabe sifazane kwezezimali.

src_text: we must therefore scale up support for women to enable them to become financially independent.
tgt_text: lokhu kungenxa yokuthi ukungalingani kwezomnotho nokungalingani kwezenhlalo kuyahambisana.

src_text: we have made a number of commitments under generation equality that will be given effect to through the national strategic plan.
tgt_text: isimo sabesifazane kwezomnotho eningizimu afrika kubenza babe buthaka kakhulu ekuhlukunyezweni.

src_text: firstly, we are going to drive women’s economic inclusion through public procurement.
tgt_text: ngakhoke kumele sikhuphule ukwesekwa kwabesifazane ukuze bakwazi ukuzimela bona ngokwezimali.

src_text: we have set the target of ensuring that at least 40 percent of goods and services procured by public entities are sourced from womenowned businesses.
tgt_text: sesenze ukuzinikela okuningi ngaphansi kokulingana kwesizukulwana okuzoba yimpumelelo ngohlelo lwamasu kazwelonke.

src_text: secondly, we are going to scale up support for womenowned smmes and for women who work in the informal sector or are unemployed.
tgt_text: okokuqala, sizoqhuba ukubandakanyeka kwabesifazane kwezomnotho ngentengiso kahulumeni.

src_text: this will include engagement with the financial sector to make financial services accessible and affordable for women.
tgt_text: sibeke ukuthi sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi okungenani izimpahla ezingamaphesenti angama40 nezinsiza ezithengwa nguhulumeni zithengwa emabhizinisini aphethwe ngabesifazane.

src_text: thirdly, we want to ensure more women have access to productive assets such as land.
tgt_text: okwesibili, sizokhuphulaukwesekwa kwamasmme aphethwe ngabesifazane kanye nabesifazane abasebenza imisebenzi engahlelekile noma abangasebenzi.

src_text: it is essential that women are beneficiaries of the accelerate land reform programme.
tgt_text: lokhu kuzobandakanya ukuxoxisana nomkhakha wezezimali ukwenza ukuthi izinsiza zezimali abesifazane bafinyelele kuzona futhi zingabizi.

src_text: it is significant that of the r75 million in covid19 relief earmarked for farming input vouchers 53 percent of the beneficiaries will be rural women.
tgt_text: okwesithathu, sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abesifazane abaningi bayafinyelela ezimpahleni zokukhiqiza ezifana nomhlaba.

src_text: we must ensure that women subsistence and smallscale farmers continue to receive support beyond the pandemic.
tgt_text: kubaluleke kakhulu ukuthi abesifazane babe ngabazuzi bohlelo lokubuyiswa komhlaba.

src_text: fourthly, we want to ensure that women are protected from genderbased violence in the workplace.
tgt_text: kubaluleke kakhulu ukuthi izigidi ezingama75 zamarandi zoxha so lwecovid19 ezibekelwe amavawusha ezolimo amaphesenti angama53 kwabazozuza kuzoba ngabesifazane basemakhaya.

src_text: in this regard, we will be working at a national and regional level towards the ratification of the ilo convention on violence and harassment in the workplace.
tgt_text: kumele siqinisekise ukuthi abatshali bokudla besifazane kanye nabalimi abancane bayaqhubeka ukuthola ukwesekwa nangale kobhubhane.

src_text: it is said that freedom is not given, but taken.
tgt_text: okwesine, sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abesifazane bayavikelwa kudlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile ezindaweni zokusebenza.

src_text: the emancipation of women is only words on paper unless it is matched by commitment from all sectors of society.
tgt_text: ngalokhuke, sizobe sise benza ezingeni likazwelonke nelesifunda ukuvumelana nengqungquthela yenhlangano yabasebenzi yamazwe ngamazwe ngodlame nokuhlukunyezwa emsebenzini.

src_text: as we prepare for the reconstruction of our economy in the wake of the coronavirus pandemic, we have said that we cannot simply return to where we were before the outbreak of the virus.
tgt_text: kuyashiwo ukuthi inkululeko ayikhangezwa, kodwa iyathathwa.

src_text: we must build a fundamentally different economy which, among other things, substantially improves the material position of women.
tgt_text: ukukhululwa kwabesifazane kungamagama abhalwe phansi nje kuphela ngaphandle uma ehambisana nokuzinikela kwemikhakha yonke yomphakathi.

src_text: this means that our investment in infrastructure must support not only the development of local industry, but also womenowned businesses.
tgt_text: njengoba silungiselela ukuphinde sifukule umnotho wethu emva kobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona , sithe ngeke nje sivele sibuyele lapho kade sikhona ngaphambi kokuqubuka kwegciwane.

src_text: it must deliberately create employment opportunities for women in all stages of planning, financing, building and maintaining infrastructure.
tgt_text: kumele sakhe isisekelo somnotho owehlukile, phakathi kwezinye zezinto, ozothuthukisa isimo sabesifazane.

src_text: by the same measures, as we scale up our public employment programmes, we must ensure that young women in particular are identified as participants.
tgt_text: lokhu kusho ukuthi utshalomali lwethu kwingqalasizinda akumele lweseke kuphela ukuthuthukiswa kwezimboni zasekhaya, kodwa namabhizinisi aphethwe ngabesifazane.

src_text: in addition to an income, these programmes will provide them with an opportunity to acquire some of the skills and experience necessary to enter the mainstream economy.
tgt_text: kumele ludale amathuba emisebenzi yabesifazane kuzozonke izigaba zoku hlela, ezezimali, ezokwakha kanye nokunakekelwa kwezingqalasizinda.

src_text: as much as it is government’s responsibility to provide economic opportunities for women and create an enabling framework for advancing gender equality, everyone in society needs to play their part.
tgt_text: ngendlela efanayo, njengoba sikhuphula izinhlelo zemisebenzi yomphakathi, kumele siqinisekise ukuthi abesifazane abasebasha ikakhulukazi babamba iqhaza.

src_text: businesses must support womenowned enterprises in the procurement of goods and services.
tgt_text: ekwengezeni kumalingeniso, lezi zinhlelo zizobahlinzeka ngethuba lokufunda amakhono kanye nesipiliyoni esidingekayo ukungena kumnotho ohlukahlukene.

src_text: they should employ more women and appoint more women to management positions.
tgt_text: noma kuyisibopho sikahulumeni ukuhlinzeka abesifazane ngamathuba omnotho futhi akhe uhlaka oluvumela ukuphucula ukulingana ngokobulili, wonke umuntu emphakathini kudingeka ukuthi adlale indima yakhe.

src_text: this is all the more important considering that the private sector’s record on genderrepresentation at management level lags behind that of the public sector.
tgt_text: amabhizinisi kumele asekele amabhizinisi aphethwe ngabesifazane ekuthengeni izimpahla nezinsiza.

src_text: this is an issue that is repeatedly raised in engagements i have had with a number of women’s business organisations.
tgt_text: kumele baqashe abesifazane kakhulu futhi babeke abesifazane abaningi ezikhundleni zokuphatha.

src_text: by equal measure, we must eliminate gender disparities in pay for men and women, and give effect to the principle of equal pay for equal work contained in the employment equity act.
tgt_text: lokhu kubaluleke kakhulu uma ubheka ukuthi ucwaningo lomkhakha ozimele mayelana nokumelwa kobulili ezingeni loku phatha lubonisa ukuba semuva kunalolo lomkhakha kahulumeni.

src_text: women must also be protected from harassment and discrimination in the workplace.
tgt_text: lena inkinga ehlale ivela ezingxoxweni engibe nazo nezinhlangano zamabhizinisi abesifazane eziningi.

src_text: it is up to transport operators, university administrators, school governing bodies and religious organisations to create conditions for women and girls to travel, study and worship in safety.
tgt_text: ngokulinganayo, kumele siqede ukungafani emiholweni yabesilisa nabesifazane, bese silandela isimiso somholo olinganayo oqukethwe kumthetho wokuqashwa ngokulingana.

src_text: we must forge ahead with our efforts to eradicate chauvinism, sexism and patriarchy.
tgt_text: abesifazane kumele bavikelwe ekuhlukumezweni nasekubandlululweni endaweni yokusebenza.

src_text: it is these attitudes that enable the oppression of women.
tgt_text: kusemahlombe abashayeli bezithuthi, abaphathi bamanyuvesi, ibhodi elilawula ukuphathwa kwesikole kanye nezinhlangano zezenkolo ukwenza izimo abesifazane namantombazane abazo hamba, bafunde futhi bakhonze kuzo bephephile.

src_text: it is up to us – both men and women – to affirm that a woman’s value, position and opinions are no less than that of a man.
tgt_text: kumele siphokophele phambili ngemizamo yethu yokuqeda ukuthi abesilisa bakhulu kunabesifazane, ukucwasana ngokobulili kanye nokunikeza amandla abesilisa.

src_text: it is up to us as parents and grandparents to treat and raise our sons and our daughters the same.
tgt_text: yiyo le ndlela yokucabanga edala ukucindezelwa kwabesifazane.

src_text: it is up to us as men to reject and speak out against genderbased violence wherever we see it, even if it is against our friends, fathers or brothers.
tgt_text: kusezandleni zethu – sonke abesilisa nabesifazane – ukugcizelela ukuthi ubugugu, isikhundla kanye nombono womuntu wesifazane awukho mncane kunalowo wowesilisa.

src_text: let us be the generation that ends the oppression of women in all its forms, in our lifetime.
tgt_text: kusezandleni zethu njengabazali kanye nogogo nomkhulu ukuphatha nokukhulisa amadodana namadodakazi ethu ngokufana.

src_text: the brave generation of 1956 marched for us all.
tgt_text: kusezandleni zethu madoda ukwala nokuphumela obala silwisana nodlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile noma ikuphi lapho silubona, noma ngabe lwenziwa ngumngani wethu, obaba noma abafowethu.

src_text: we owe it to them, to ourselves and to future generations to not betray this noble legacy.
tgt_text: ukubungazwa kwabesifazane ukubungazwa kwabesifazane ngokubabandakanya kwezomnothongokubabandakanya kwezomnotho vukuzenzele unnamed ngoncwaba iningizi mu afrika ibungaza inyanga yabesifazane.

src_text: back to work after covid19 a full guide allison cooper when can you return to work if you have tested positive for the coronavirus (covid19)?
tgt_text: ukubuyela emsebenzini emva kokululama kwicovid19 allison cooper ungabuyela nini emsebenzini uma ngabe uke watholakala ukuthi wesuleleke ngegciwane lecorona (icovid19)?

src_text: the national institute for communicable diseases has the answers you need.
tgt_text: isikhungo se zifo ezithathelanayo kuzwelonke sinezimpendulo ozidingayo.

src_text: when i test positive for covid19, how long do i have to stay in isolation?
tgt_text: uma ngabe ngihlonzwa njengonecovid19 , kumele ngi hlale isikhathi esingakanani endaweni yokuhlala ngawedwana?

src_text: people who test positive for covid19, but don’t have any symptoms, must remain in isolation at home or in a government isolation facility for 10 days, from the day they receive their positive test result.
tgt_text: abantu abahlonzwe njengabanecovid19 , kepha abangena zo izimpawu, kumele baqhubeke bahlale endaweni yokuhlala ngawedwana ekhaya noma esikhungweni sokuhlala ngawedwana sikahulumeni izinsuku eziyi10, ukusuka ngosuku othole ngalo imiphumela ethi unaleli gciwane.

src_text: those who have mild symptoms must remain in isolation at home or in a government isolation facility for 10 days, from the day their symptoms start.
tgt_text: labo abanezimpawu ezincane kumele baqhubeke bahlale endaweni yokuhlala ngawedwana ekhaya noma esikhungweni sokuhlala ngawedwana sikahulumeni izinsuku eziyi10, uku suka ngosuku okwaqala ngalo izimpawu zaleli gciwane.

src_text: those who have severe disease, who have to go to hospital, must remain in isolation for 10 days, from when they are stable and don’t need oxygen anymore.
tgt_text: labo abanezifo ezibucayi, okumele baye esibhedlela, kumele baqhubeke bahlale endaweni yokuhlala ngawedwana izinsuku eziyi10, ukusuka sebezizwa ngconywana futhi bengasayidingi ioksijini.

src_text: how can a covid19 positive people transfer the disease to others?
tgt_text: abantu abanecovid19 bangasidlulisela kanjani lesi sifo kwabanye?

src_text: according to health minister zweli mkhize, most people who have a mild infection can spread the virus for between seven to 12 days.
tgt_text: ngokuka ngqongqoshe wezempilo uzweli mkhize, abantu abaningi abanalokhu kugula okungabonakali bangalibhebhethekisa leli gciwane phakathi kwezinsuku eziyisikhombisa kuya kweziyi12.

src_text: however, people who become very sick could be infectious and be able to transmit the virus to others for a longer period of time.
tgt_text: noma kunjalo, abantu abagula kakhulu bangaba nobungozi obukhulu futhi bange sulela abanye ngaleli gciwane isikhathi eside.

src_text: do i have to have another covid19 test, proving that i am negative, before i return to work?
tgt_text: ngakube kufanele yini na ukuba ngiphinde ngihlolelwe icovid19 , ukufakazela ukuthi angi senalo leli gciwane, ngaphambi kokuba ngibuyele emsebenzini?

src_text: no.
tgt_text: cha.

src_text: retesting people who have experienced mild illness and have recovered is not recommended.
tgt_text: ukuphinda uhlole abantu abahlangabezana nokugula okungabonakali futhi asebeluleme akunconywa.

src_text: a person is considered safe to return to work and come out of isolation if they are no longer infectious.

tgt_text: ngokuvamile, abasebenzi banga buyela emsebenzini ngaphandle kokuhlola futhi uma: beqede izinsuku eziyi10 eziyimpoqo ukuthi uzihlale endaweni yokugonqa noma yokuhlala ngawedwana.

src_text: let’s keep each other safe vukuzenzele unnamed our country has moved to alert level 2 in our response to the coronavirus pandemic.
tgt_text: masigcinane siphephile vukuzenzele unnamed izwe lethu lehlele esigabeni sesi2 sokuqapha ekulweni kwethu nobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona .

src_text: this has come as a relief to all south africans who have had to live under stringent restrictions for the last five months.
tgt_text: lokhu kube njengokukhu luleka kubobonke abantu baseningizimu afrika abesebephila ngaphansi kwemikhawulo enzima izi nyanga eziyisihlanu eze dlule.

src_text: it is a sign of the progress we are making in reducing new infections and demand on our health facilities.
tgt_text: kuluphawu lwenqubeke laphambili esiyenzayo uku nciphisa ukusuleleka okusha kanye nomthamo ezikhu ngweni zethu zezempilo.

src_text: it is also a very important development as we strive to restart our economy.
tgt_text: futhi kungukuthuthuka okubalulekile kakhulu njengoba siphokophelele ekuqaleni umnotho wethu kabusha.

src_text: but it is too soon to celebrate.
tgt_text: kodwake kusesekuseni kakhulu ukuthi singajabula.

src_text: we are still very much in the middle of a deadly pandemic that has taken over 11,000 lives in south africa alone.
tgt_text: sisaphila phakathi kwalo mashayabhuqe wobhubhane osuthathe izimpilo zabantu abayizi11 000 eningizimu afrika kuphela nje.

src_text: at more than half a million confirmed cases, we still have the fifth highest number of infections in the world.
tgt_text: ezi gamekweni eziqinisekisiwe ezingaphezu kwesigamu sesigidi, sisahleli esibalweni sesihlanu samanani aphe zulu kakhulu okwesuleleka emhlabeni.

src_text: and there is always a chance of a resurgence of the disease.
tgt_text: futhi kuhlale kunethuba lokuphinde si bheduke isifo.

src_text: if we ever need a stark reminder of the need for vigilance, we should look to recent events thousands of kilometres away in new zealand.
tgt_text: uma kwenzeka sidinga into ezosikhumbuza isidingo sokuthi siqaphelisise, kumele sibheke izigameko zaka muva ezenzeke endaweni engamakhilomitha ayizinku lungwane enew zealand.

src_text: three months since the country was declared coronavirusfree, new zealand is once again under lockdown.
tgt_text: ezinyangeni ezintathu emva kokumemezela izwe njenge lingasenalo igciwane lecorona, inew zealand isiphinde yaba ngaphansi kokuvalwa kwezwe.

src_text: although the latest outbreak was of relatively few cases, the government swiftly reimposed lockdown restrictions.
tgt_text: yize ukuqubuka kwegciwane kwakamuva kwaba nezigameko ezimba lwa, uhulumeni waphinde wabeka imikhawulo yoku valwa kwezwe ngokupha zima kweso.

src_text: similar restrictions have had to be reimposed in several parts of europe as they experience a ‘second wave’ of infections.
tgt_text: imikhawulo efanayo kumele ukuthi iphinde ibekwe ezingxenyeni ezini ngi zaseyurophu njengo ba bebhekane ‘nehlandla lesibili’ lokusuleleka.

src_text: these experiences show just how swiftly things can change when it comes to covid19.
tgt_text: lezi zigameko zibonisa ukuthi izinto zingaguquka kanjani ngokuphazima nje kweso ngenxa yecovid19 .

src_text: it is a wakeup call to any among us who may harbour illusions that we are even close to seeing the end of this grave public health emergency.
tgt_text: kuyisixwayiso kunoma ngubani phakathi kwethu ongaphupha emini ukuthi selidumela emansumpeni ekuboneni isiphetho saloku kufa kwempilo yomphakathi ephuthumayo.

src_text: certainly, there are signs of hope.
tgt_text: nomakanjani, ikhona inhla nsi yethemba elokozayo.

src_text: the number of new confirmed cases in south africa continues to decline.
tgt_text: inani lezigameko ezintsha eziqinisekisiwe eningizimu afrika liyaqhubeka nokwe hla.

src_text: at the peak of the disease just one month ago, we were recording around 12,000 new cases a day.
tgt_text: esicongweni sesifo enya ngeni eyodwa eyedlule, inani lezigameko eziqinise kisiwe ezintsha beliyizi12 000 ngosuku.

src_text: this has dropped to an average of around 5,000 a day over the past week.
tgt_text: lokhu sekwe hle kwaya esilinganisweni esiphakathi esiyizi5 000 ngosuku evikini eledlule.

src_text: our recovery rate stands at 80 percent.
tgt_text: izinga lethu lokululama lime kumaphesenti angama80.

src_text: as the country moves to alert level 2, many restrictions on social and economic activity have been lifted.
tgt_text: njengoba izwe lehlela esigabeni sesi2 sokuqapha, imikhawulo eminingi kwe zenhlalo nakwezomnotho isi susiwe.

src_text: with this comes increased risk of transmission.
tgt_text: lokhu kuza nobungo zi obukhulu bokusuleleka.

src_text: we now need to manage this risk and ensure the gains we have made thus far in containing the pandemic’s spread are not reversed.
tgt_text: manje sekumele silawule ubungozi futhi siqinisekise ukuthi esesikuzuzile kuze kube manje ekubambeze leni ukubhebhetheka kobhu bhane akubuyeli emuva.

src_text: the greatest threat to the health of nation right now is complacency.
tgt_text: ubungozi obulengele impilo yesizwe njengamanje ukwe qiwa injabulo bese sikhohlwa ubungozi.

src_text: it may be that we are now permitted to meet friends and family, to visit entertainment venues, to travel for leisure and to consume alcohol in restaurants, bars and taverns.
tgt_text: kungenzeka ukuthi manje sesivumelekile ukuhlangana nabangani nomndeni, ukuvakashela izindawo zokuzijabulisa, ukuthatha uhambo kuyonce belekwa nokuphuza utshwa la ezindaweni zokudlela, ezindaweni zokuphuzela utshwala nasemathaveni.

src_text: but as the old adage goes, just because you can, doesn’t mean you should.
tgt_text: kodwa njengesisho saku dala esithi, ukuthi unga kwazi ukwenza into, lokho akusho ukuthi kumele uye nze.

src_text: many people who have the coronavirus do not have symptoms and may not even know they are infected.
tgt_text: abantu abaningi abahaqwe igciwane lecorona abanazo izimpawu futhi kungenzeka bangazi nakwazi ukuthi ba sulelekile.

src_text: this is a sobering reality because it means that any of us could be infected right now and could unwittingly infect others.
tgt_text: leli iqiniso eli hlasimulisa umzimba ngoba lokhu kusho ukuthi noma ngubani kithina kungenzeka usulelekile njengamanje futhi kungenzeka usulele abanye ngokungenhloso.

src_text: this is particular the case when visiting relatives, especially the elderly and those with preexisting medical conditions that render them vulnerable to infection.
tgt_text: kuzoba njalo uma ku vakashelwa izihlobo, ikakhu lukazi abantu asebekhulile kanye nalabo abanezifo ezi ngamahlalakhona ezibenza babe buthakathaka ekwe sulelekeni.

src_text: it is also true for attending religious services or cultural activities.
tgt_text: futhi kuliqiniso uma kuthanyelwa izinkonzo noma imicimbi yamasiko.

src_text: the ‘second wave’ of infections that several other countries have experienced is an everpresent possibility for us too.
tgt_text: ‘ihlandla lesibili’ lokwe suleleka amanye amazwe amaningi abhekene nalo into ehlezi ingenzeka na kuthina.

src_text: although many restrictions have been lifted, it does not mean they will not return should we experience a significant rise in infections.
tgt_text: yize imikhawulo eminingi seyisusiwe, lokhu akusho ukuthi ngeke iphinde ibuyiswe uma kungenzeka sibhekane nokukhuphuka kokusuleleka.

src_text: this pandemic is a matter of life and death.
tgt_text: lolu bhu bhane luyisimo sokufa noku phila.

src_text: we need to adapt and we need to be vigilant.
tgt_text: kumele sivumelane nesimo futhi sidinga ukuthi siqaphelisise.

src_text: in the days, weeks and months that lie ahead, we must urgently focus our efforts on recovery.
tgt_text: ezinsukwini, emavikini nasezinyangeni ezizayo, kumele ngokuphuthumayo sibhekane nemizamo yethu yokululama.

src_text: our economy and our society has suffered a great deal.
tgt_text: umnotho wethu nomphakathi wethu bakhahlamezeke kakhulu.

src_text: as we return to economic activity across almost all industries – and work to repair the damage done – we have a responsibility to not let our guard down as individuals, employers, communities, families, professionals, workers and citizens.
tgt_text: njengoba sesibuyela emse benzini cishe kuzozonke izimboni – futhi sisebenza ukulungisa umonakalo owenzekile – sinesibophe zelo sokungayekeli uku hlale siqaphile njengomunye nomunye, njengabaqashi, njengomphakathi, njenge mindeni, njengochwephe she, njengabasebenzi kanye nezakhamuzi.

src_text: none of us wants a return to the early days of extreme lockdown restrictions.
tgt_text: akekho kuthina ofuna ukubuyela ezinsukwini ezi dlule zemikhawulo eqinile yokuvalwa kwezwe.

src_text: we want to move on with our lives.
tgt_text: sifuna ukuqhubeka nezimpilo zethu.

src_text: we want our friends and loved ones to remain healthy and safe.
tgt_text: sifuna abangani bethu nabathandiweyo bethu bahlale benempilo futhi be phephile.

src_text: as a nation, let us continue to work together to ensure that we progress.
tgt_text: njengesizwe, asiqhubeke sisebenze ngokubambisana ukuqinisekisa ukuthi siqhubekela phambili.

src_text: the move to alert level 2 of the lockdown is not a ‘free for all.’ the rules on social distancing, mask wearing, social gatherings and international travel remain.
tgt_text: ukwehlela esigabeni sesi2 sokuvalwa kwezwe akuyona nje ‘inkululeko kawonkewonke.’ imithetho yokuqhelelana, ukugqokwa kwezifonyo, imibuthano yomphakathi kanye noku vakashela amanye amazwe isamile.

src_text: our success rests on our ability to abide by these regulations and to ensure that we each behave carefully and responsibly.
tgt_text: impumelelo yethu ilele ekuthobeleni kwethu le mithethonqubo futhi noku qinisekisa ukuthi omunye nomunye uziphatha ngoku zinakekela nangokuzibo phezela.

src_text: every time we are considering any form of nonessen tial activity, we should ask: what is the risk of infection to ourselves and to others?
tgt_text: ngaso sonke isikhathi uma sicabanga nanoma isiphi isenzo esingabalulekile, kumele sibuze ukuthi: ibu phi ubungozi bokusuleleka kuthina nakwabanye?

src_text: where there is a risk, even a slight one, it is better not to do it.
tgt_text: lapho kukhona khona ubungozi, noma ngabe buncane kanga kanani, kungcono ninga kwenzi.

src_text: let us proceed, as ever, with caution.
tgt_text: asiphokophele phambili, njengakuqala, ngokuqa phela.

src_text: let us keep each other safe.
tgt_text: masigcinane siphephile vukuzenzele unnamed izwe lethu lehlele esigabeni sesi2 sokuqapha ekulweni kwethu nobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona .

src_text: protect our women and children vukuzenzele unnamed a year ago, almost to the day, thousands of wom en, men and children marched to parliament to protest against a spate of rapes and killings of women and girls.
tgt_text: masivikele abesifazane nabantwana bethu vukuzenzele unnamed onyakeni owedlule, osukwini oluseduze nje, izinku lungwane zabesifazane, amadoda kanye nabantwana bamashela ephalamende ukuyobhikishela ukulwisana nesihlava sokudlwengulwa kanye nokubulawa kwabesifazane namantombazane.

src_text: at the time, the nation was reeling from the murders of uyinene mrwetyana, leighandre jegels, jesse hess and a number of other women who had lost their lives at the hands of brutal men.
tgt_text: ngaleso sikhathi, isizwe sasi sakhungathwe ukubulawa kukauyinene mrwetyana, uleighandre jegels, ujesse hess kanye nabanye abesifazane abaningi abalahlekelwa izimpilo zabo ngezandla zamadoda anesihluku.

src_text: from all social backgrounds, young and old, students and working women, the peaceful protesters held aloft placards that read ‘enough is enough’ and ‘am i next?’.
tgt_text: kusuka kuyoyonke indawo, omnca ne nomdala, abafundi nabesifazane abasebenzayo, ababhikishi ababebhikisha ngokuthula babephakamise izingqwembe ezazibhalwe ukuthi 'enough is enough ' nokuthi ' am i next?'.

src_text: the anguish and the anger was palpable that day.
tgt_text: usizi nentukuthelo kwakubhalwe emehlweni ngalolo suku.

src_text: as i received their clearly articulated demands, it was clear to me that we needed to act urgently and with determination.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi ngamukela izimfuno zabo ezazibekwe zacaca bha, kwacaca kumina ukuthi kudingeka sisukume ngokushesha futhi nangokuzimisela.

src_text: it was important to me that i did not respond with hollow words and empty promises.
tgt_text: kwakubalulekile kumina ukuthi ngingaphenduli ngamagama ayize leze futhi nangezithembiso zamanga.

src_text: a few days later, i called a joint sitting of parliament, where we announced a r1.6 billion emergency response action plan to combat genderbased violence and femicide (gbvf).
tgt_text: ezinsukwini ezimbalwa ezalandela, ngabiza umhlangano wokuhlala ngokuhlanganyela kwezindlu zombili zephalamende, lapho samemezela isamba esingur1.6 wesigidigidi sohlelo lwezinyathelo eziphuthumayo zokulwisananodlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile nokubulawa kwabesifazane (igbvf).

src_text: over the six months of its implementation, public spending in various government departments was reprioritised to support interventions for care and support for survivors, for awareness and prevention campaigns, to improve laws and policies, to promote the economic empowerment of women, and to strengthen the criminal justice system.
tgt_text: ezinyangeni eziyisithupha selokhu sethulwa, ukusetshenziswa kwemali eminyangweni ehlukene kahulumeni kwabuye kwahlelwa kwabusha ngokubeka phambili ukunakekelwa nokwesekwa kwabasindile, ukuqwashisa kanye nemikhankaso yoku vikela, ukwenza ngcono imithetho nezinqubomigomo, ukuthuthukisa ukwesekwa kwabesifazane kwezomnotho, kanye nokuqinisa uhlelo lobulungiswa kwezobugebengu.

src_text: and now we are on the cusp of the most farreaching legislative overhaul in the fight against gbvf.
tgt_text: futhi njengamanje sisesikhathini lapho ingalo ende yomthetho isiguqulwe kabusha ukuze kuliwe negbvf .

src_text: three key bills relating to gbvf have been introduced in parliament recently.
tgt_text: imithethosivivinywa emithathu ebalulekile ehlobene negbvf yethulwe ephalamende muva nje.

src_text: through the introduction of these bills, we are honouring the promise we made to the protestors last year and to all the women of this country.
tgt_text: ngokwethulwa kwale mithethosivivinywa, sigcina isethembiso esasenza kubabhikishi ngonyaka odlule nakubobonke abesifazane bakuleli lizwe.

src_text: the three amendment bills are designed to fill the gaps that allow some perpetrators of these crimes to evade justice and to give full effect to the rights of our country’s women and children.
tgt_text: imithethosivivinywa echitshiyelwe emithathu yenzelwe ukuvala igebe elivumela izaphulamthetho ukubalekela ubulungiswa futhi inika ngokugcwele abesifazane nabantwana bezwe lethu amalungelo.

src_text: these bills, once finalised, will help to restore the confidence of our country’s women that the law is indeed there to protect them.
tgt_text: le mithethosivivinywa, uma isiphasisiwe yaba imithetho, izosiza ukubuyisa ukuzethemba kwabesifazane bezwe lethu njengoba umthetho ukhona ukuze ubavikele.

src_text: the first is the bill to amend the criminal law (sexual offences and related matters) amendment act.
tgt_text: owokuqala umthethosivivinywa ochibiyela umthetho wokuchibiyela wamacala ezobugebengu (amacala ezocansi nahambisana nawo).

src_text: this creates a new offence of sexual intimidation, extends the ambit of the offence of incest, and extends the reporting duty of persons who suspect a sexual offence has been committed against a child.
tgt_text: lokhu kwethula amacala amasha okusatshiswa ngokocansi, amacala okulalana kwezihlobo, kanye nomsebenzi wabantu wokubika uma besola ukuthi kukhona ukuhlukunyezwa ngokocansi okwenzekile emntwaneni.

src_text: it expands the scope of the national register for sex offenders (nrso) to include the particulars of all sex offenders.
tgt_text: iphinde yelula ukuthi irejista kazwelonke yamacala ezocansi (inrso) ifake lonke uhla lwabaphulimthetho kwezocansi.

src_text: until now, it has only applied to sex offenders convicted of sex crimes perpetrated against children or persons with mental disabilities.
tgt_text: kuze kube manje, isafake kuphela abaphulimthetho kwezocansi abalahlwe ngamacala ezocansi kubantwana noma kubantu abaphila nokukhubazeka ngokwengqondo.

src_text: the time an offender’s particulars must remain on the register has been increased, and those listed on the register will have to disclose this when they submit applications to work with vulnerable persons.
tgt_text: isikhathi sokugcinwa kohla lwesaphulimthetho sikhushuliwe, futhi labo abafakwe kurejista kuzomele bakudalule lokho uma befaka izicelo zokusebenza nabantu ababuthakathaka.

src_text: the bill also provides for the names of persons on the nrso to be publicly available.
tgt_text: umthethosivivinywauphinde uhlinzekele ukuthi amagama abantu akunrso umphakathi uyakwazi ukuwathola.

src_text: the criminal and related matters amendment bill tightens, among others, the granting of bail to perpetrators of gbvf, and expands the offences for which minimum sentences must be imposed.
tgt_text: isichibiyelo somthethosivivinywa wamacala obugebengu kanye nahambisana nawo sizoqinisa, phakathi kokunye, ukunikezwa kwebheyili kwezaphulamthetho zegbvf , futhi sichaze kabanzi ngamacala azothola izigwebo ezincane.

src_text: the amendments impose new obligations on lawenforcement officials and on our courts.
tgt_text: izichibiyelo zibeka izibopho ezintsha phezu kwezikhulu zomthetho kanye nezinkantolo zethu.

src_text: when a prosecutor does not oppose bail in cases of gbv, they have to place their reasons on record.
tgt_text: uma umshushisi engasiphikisi isicelo sebheyili emacaleni egbv , kumele abhale izizathu zakhe phansi.

src_text: unless a person accused of gbv can provide exceptional circumstances why they should be released on bail, the court must order their detention until the criminal proceedings are concluded.
tgt_text: ngaphandle uma umsolwa wecala legbv angabeka izimo ezinqala ukuthi kungani kumele akhululwe ngebheyili, inkantolo kumele inqume ukuthi bavalelwe kuze kuphele ukuthethwa kwecala.

src_text: in reaching a decision on a bail application, the courts are compelled to take a number of considerations into account.
tgt_text: ekuthatheni isinqumo esicelweni sebheyili, izinkantolo ziphoqelekile ukucabangisisa ngezinto eziningi.

src_text: they include pretrial reports on the desirability of releasing an accused on bail, threats of violence made against a survivor, and the view of the survivor regarding his or her safety.
tgt_text: okubandakanya imibiko yaphambi kokuthethwa kwecala, ukwesatshiswa okunodlame kosindile, kanye nombono wosindile mayelana nokuphepha kwakhe.

src_text: when it comes to parole, a complainant or a relative of a deceased victim must be able to make representation to the parole board.
tgt_text: mayelana noshwele, ummangali noma isihlobo sesisulu esashona kumele bakwazi ukuyozimela kwibhodi likashwele.

src_text: given the unacceptably high levels of intimate partner violence in our country, we have tightened the provisions of the domestic violence act.
tgt_text: ngokubuka amazinga angamukeleki neze odlame kubalingani abasebudlelwaneni ezweni lethu, sesiqinise ukuhlinzekwa komthetho wodlame lwasekhaya.

src_text: domestic violence is now defined to cover those in engagements, dating, in customary relationships, and actual or perceived romantic, intimate or sexual relationships of any duration.
tgt_text: udlame lwasekhaya manje seluchazwa ukuze luvikele labo abathembisene umshado, abajolayo, ubudlelwano bamasiko, abathandanayo, ubudlelwano bocansi osebuqhubeke noma isikhathi esingakanani.

tgt_text: noma ngabe kumele sikhethe ukuthi si khokhele okuqukethwe izindaba, ukusekela izinta theli ezixhaswe ngeminikelo yomphakathi, ukukhokhela amalayisensi akwasabc noma nje ngokuthenga iphe phandaba, sonke singadlala indima yethu ukwesekela le mboni esenkingeni.

src_text: as government, despite the gloomy economic climate we will continue to extend advertising spend to publications and broadcasters, especially community media.
tgt_text: njengo hulumeni, ngaphezu kwesimo somnotho ontengantengayo sizoqhubeka nokukhangisa kulabo abashicilelayo na basakazayo, ikakhulukazi abezindaba basemphakathini.

src_text: the private sector must also continue to support the industry through advertising and working with media houses in the production of innovative content in line with global media trends.
tgt_text: umkhakha ozimele kumele nawo uqhubeke nokweseka le mboni ngokukhangisa kanye nokusebenzisana nabezinda ba ekukhiqizeni izindaba ezi ntsha ezisezingeni lomhlaba.

src_text: local philanthropic and donor organisations should also come on board and support public interest journalism ventures, as is the case in many democracies.
tgt_text: labo abanesihe balapha ekhaya kanye nezinhlangano ezinikelayo kumele nabo bangenelele basekele amabhi zinisi abezindaba, njengoba kunjalo kwintando yeningi labantu.

src_text: the proliferation of fake news during the pandemic, primarily on social media platforms, has added to the urgency for more news that is accurate, fair and impartial.
tgt_text: ukwanda kwezindaba ezi ngelona iqiniso ngesikhathi sobhubhane, ikakhulukazi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, kwengeze isidingo esiphuthu mayo sezindaba eziningi ezinembayo, ezilungile futhi ezingathathi cala.

src_text: during this time our people have relied on our established media houses for information, once again underscoring their importance as pillars of our democracy.
tgt_text: ngalesi sikhathi abantu bakithi bathembele kwabezindaba ngolwazi, futhi sibukela phansi ukubaluleka kwabo njengezinsika zentando yeningi labantu.

src_text: as we begin the great task of rebuilding our economy in the aftermath of the pandemic, the media industry will need our support more than ever.
tgt_text: njengoba siqala umsebenzi omkhulu wokwakha kabu sha umnotho wethu emva kwemiphumela yobhubhane, imboni yabezindaba izodinga ukuthi siyisekele kakhulu kunakuqala.

src_text: the free press was once described as ‘the unsleeping guardian of every other right that free men and women prize’.
tgt_text: inkululeko ya bezindaba yake yachazwa 'njengomnakekeli ongalali walolonke ilungelo elikhulula amadoda nabesifazane'.

src_text: as we salute their role in this pandemic, let us do what we can to ensure that the free and diverse media in our country is able to survive and thrive.
tgt_text: abezindaba baseningizimu afrika bayinsika yentando yeningi labantu vukuzenzele unnamed emazweni amaningi emhlabeni jikelele, ubhubhane lwegci wane lecorona lunciphise inkululeko yomphakathi lwaphinde lwalinga ubu mbano lomphakathi.

src_text: transforming the agricultural sector vukuzenzele unnamed recently, the department of agriculture, land reform and rural development (dalrrd) announced that members of the public will be able to apply to lease 700 000 hectares of underutilised or vacant state land in seven of the provinces.
tgt_text: ukuguqula umkhakha wezolimo vukuzenzele unnamed kamuva nje, umnyango wezolimo, ukuguqulwa komhlaba kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya (idlrd) wamemezela ukuthi amalungu omphakathi azokwazi ukufaka izicelo zokuqasha umhlaba wombuso ongamahe ktha ayizi700 000 ongasetshenziswa noma ohleli nje ezifundazweni eziyisikhombisa.

src_text: agricultural land is the mainstay of our natural resource base.
tgt_text: ezolimo ziyinsika yesisekelo sokumbiwa phansi kwe mvelo.

src_text: the availability and sustainable use of farmland to grow crops and for animal husbandry is key to our very survival.
tgt_text: ukuba khona nokuse tshenziswa okusimeme kwendawo yokulima izitshalo nokufuya izilwane sizonqoba ngakho.

src_text: south africa has vast tracts of land suitable for agricultural production, with 37,9% of our total land area currently being used for commercial agriculture.
tgt_text: iningizimu afrika inomhlaba omningi kakhulu olungele umkhiqizo wezolimo, ama37.9% omhlaba wethu wonke njengamanje usetshenziselwa ezolimo ukuze kuthengiswe.

src_text: like many other countries, our arable land is under threat from land degradation, water scarcity and urban encroachment.
tgt_text: njengamanye amazwe, umhlaba wethu ovundile usengcupheni yokuncipha kokuvunda, ukungabi namanzi ngokwanele kanye nokusetshenziswa komhlaba ukwakha kuwona.

src_text: we are also losing prime agricultural land through landuse changes.
tgt_text: siphinde silahlekelwe umhlaba wokulima omkhulu kakhulu ngenxa yezinguquko ekusetshe nzisweni komhlaba.

src_text: given our history, broadening access to agricultural land for commercial production and subsistence farming is a national priority.
tgt_text: uma sibheka umlando wethu, ukunweba ukufinyelela emhlabeni wokulima imikhiqizo ezothengiswa nokulimela ukuziphilisa kuyinto eseqhulwini kuzwelonke.

src_text: although the post1994 land reform process has resulted in more land being restored and restituted to black south africans, the pernicious effects of the 1913 natives land act continue to be in patterns of farmland ownership.
tgt_text: yize uhlelo lokuguqulwa komhlaba lwangasemva kowe1994 luholele ekubu yisweni komhlaba omningi wabuyiselwa kubantu aba nsundu baseningizimu afrika, umphumela oyingozi womthetho wangowe1913 womhlaba wabomdabu uyaqhubeka nokubonakala ebunikazini bomhlaba wokulima.

src_text: the act went far beyond dispossessing millions of people of their ancestral land.
tgt_text: lo mthetho waqhubeka na ngaphezu kokuphuca izigidi zabantu umhlaba wokhokho babo.

src_text: with land ownership still concentrated in the hands of the few, and agriculture primary production and value chains mainly owned by white commercial farmers, the effects of our past remain with us today.
tgt_text: njengoba ubunikazi bomhlaba busesezandleni zabayidlanzana, nokukhiqizwa kwezolimo okukhulu nemisebenzi ehambisana nokukhiqizwa iphethwe ngabalimi abamhlo phe, imiphumela ye sikhathi sethu esedlule isalokhu inathi namuhla.

src_text: the continued monopolization of a key means of production like land is not just an obstacle to advancing a more egalitarian society; it is also a recipe for social unrest.
tgt_text: ukuqhubeka nokubusa wedwa emikhiqizweni eba lulekile njengomhlaba akusiso nje isithikamezo ekwenzeni ngcono umphakathi oli nganayo; kuzodala inxu shunxushu emphakathini.

src_text: the hunger for land to farm is growing, especially amongst the rural poor.
tgt_text: ukulambela umhlaba wokulima kuyakhula, ikakhulukazi kulabo abadla imbuya ngothi emakhaya.

src_text: and for a number of reasons, the pace of land reform in this particular sector has been slow and unsatisfactory.
tgt_text: ngezizathu eziningi, ukuguqulwa ko mhlaba kulo mkhakha ku hamba ngonyawo lonwabu futhi akugculisi.

src_text: transforming patterns of agricultural land ownership is vital not just to address the historical injustices of the past, but to safeguard our nation’s food security.
tgt_text: ukuguqula ukuphathwa kobunikazi bomhlaba wokulima kubaluleke kakhulu hhayi nje ukuze kubhekanwe no mlando ongenabulungiswa, kodwa ukuze sivikele ukuphepha kokudla kwesizwe sethu.

src_text: as noted in the 2019 report of the presidential advisory panel on land reform and agriculture, "whilst we export food, back home 41% of people in rural areas and 59,4% in urban areas have severely inadequate access to food."
tgt_text: njengoba kubekiwe embi kweni wangowezi2019 wesi gungu eseluleka umongameli ngokuguqulwa komhlaba kanye nezolimo, "ngesikhathi thina sithumela ukudla kwamanye amazwe, emuva ekhaya abantu abangama41% ezindaweni zasemakhaya kanye nabangama59.4% emadolobheni abafinyeleli ngokwanele ekudleni."

src_text: agrarian reform has been a priority of successive administrations since democracy.
tgt_text: ukuguqulwa kwezolimo bekulokhu kuseqhulwini kubaphathi abalandelanayo kusukela kwintando yeningi labantu.

src_text: between 1994 and march 2018 the state has delivered 8,4 million hectares of land to previously disadvantaged individuals under the land reform programme.
tgt_text: phakathi kowe1994 nondasa kowezi2018 uhulu meni unikeze amahektha omhlaba ayizigidi eziyisi8.4 kubantu abebencishwe amathuba ngaphansi kohlelo lokuguqulwa komhlaba.

src_text: but this progress amounts to less than 10% of all commercial farmland.
tgt_text: kodwa le nqubekelapha mbili ilingana nokungaphansi kwe10% komhlaba ophelele wokulima.
