src_text: in my state of the nation address earlier this year i committed that stateowned agricultural land would soon be released for farming.
tgt_text: enkulumweni yami yesimo sezwe ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka ngazibophezela ukuthi umhlaba wokulima ongapha nsi kukahulumeni uzodede lwa maduze ukuze kulinywe.

src_text: this is a major milestone in the agrarian reform process, and gives effect to the promise of the freedom charter that the land shall be shared among those who work it.
tgt_text: lokhu kuyingqophamla ndo ohlelweni lokuguqulwa kwezolimo, futhi lugcina isithembiso esikusomqulu wenkululeko esithi umhlaba kuzokwabelwana ngawo kulabo abasebenza kuwona.

src_text: our redistributive vision aims to strike a balance between social justice and redress, and enhancing agricultural output by bringing more black farmers into the mainstream of the economy.
tgt_text: umbono wethu wokuphi nde kwabiwe umhlaba uhlose ukulinganisa phakathi kobulungiswa kwezenhlalo noku lungisa, nokukhulisa imi khiqizo yezolimo ngokuletha abalimi abansundu abaningi emnothweni omkhulu.

src_text: land is a productive asset that generates profit and can be used for collateral to secure other assets.
tgt_text: umhlaba uyifa eliletha inzuzo futhi ungasetshenzi swa njengesibambiso ukuzu za elinye ifa.

src_text: we have to ensure that land acquired for farming purposes is productively used.
tgt_text: kumele siqinisekise ukuthi umhlaba odingekayo ukuze kulinywe usetshenziswa ngendlela enenzuzo.

src_text: to safeguard the allocated state land for farming purposes, the lease is not transferrable.
tgt_text: ukuze siqaphe umhlaba onikeziwe kahulumeni ukuze kuli nywe kuwona, isivumelwano sokuwuqasha asidluliseleki komunye umuntu.

src_text: beneficiaries will sign a lease agreement with the state and pay a rental fee consistent with the land value.
tgt_text: abazu zile bazosayina isivumelwano sokuqasha nohulumeni bese bekhokha imali yokuqasha elingana nenani lomhlaba.

src_text: we must also ensure that farmers are supported along the road to sustainability and profitability.
tgt_text: kumele futhi siqinisekise ukuthi abalimi bayasekelwa baze basimame futhi benze inzuzo.

src_text: as part of this programme, beneficiaries will be trained in financial management and enterprise development.
tgt_text: njengengxenye yalolu hlelo, abazuzile bazoqeqeshwa ngokulawula izimali kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwamabhizinisi.

src_text: experience has shown that emerging and smallscale farmers often lack the financial skills to exploit market opportunities and integrate with value chains.
tgt_text: isikhathi esidlule sibonise ukuthi abalimi abasafufusa nabasebancane ba jwayele ukuswela amakhono kwezezimali ukubhekana namathuba ezimakethe kanye nokuzihlanganisa nokwenziwa kwemikhiqizo.

src_text: we are prioritizing women, youth and persons with disabilities as beneficiaries.
tgt_text: sibeke eqhulwini abesifazane, intsha kanye nabantu abaphila nokukhubazeka njengabantu abazozuza.

src_text: there has been demonstrable success with empowering women farmers under the existing proactive land acquisition strategy.
tgt_text: sekube nempumelelo ebonakalayo ngokuhlomisa abalimi besifazane ngaphansi kwesu lokutholwa komhlaba ipro active land acquisition strategy (iplas).

src_text: in a number of provinces, women who have been allocated farms by the dalrrd have been able to run them successfully and even move into commercial production.
tgt_text: ezifundazweni eziningi, abesifazane asebenikwe amapulazi yidlrd bakwazile ukuwaqhuba ngempumelelo futhi sebedlulele ekukhiqizeni imikhiqizo ethengiswayo.

src_text: in addition to the land acquisition itself, the department continues to invest in infrastructure, equipment and machinery to enable these entrepreneurs to run successful businesses.
tgt_text: ukwengeza ekutholweni komhlaba ngokwawo, u mnyango uyaqhubeka no kutshala izimali kwingqala sizinda, izinsizakusebenza nemishini ukuze labo somabhizinisi abancane bezokwazi ukuqhuba amabhizinisi aphumelelayo.

src_text: broadening access to land and opportunities for farming will support job creation and enterprise development, and improve the market for food, agricultural goods and services.
tgt_text: ukusabalalisa ukufinyelela emhlabeni nasemathubeni okulima kuzosekela ukusu ngulwa kwemisebenzi kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwama bhizinisi, futhi kuthuthukisa imakethe yokudla, izimpahla zolimo kanye nezinsiza.

src_text: the ultimate goal of releasing these land parcels is to transform the agricultural landscape by growing a new generation of farmers.
tgt_text: inhloso enkulu yokudedela lezi ziqephu zomhlaba ngukuguqula isimo sezolimo ngokukhulisa isizukulwane esisha sabalimi.

src_text: leasing land under such favourable conditions must spur them to think big; to not just grow their own businesses but to advance shared wealth and prosperity in the communities in which they farm.
tgt_text: ukuqasha umhlaba ngaphansi kwezimo ezivunayo kumele kubenze bacabange okukhulu; hhayi nje ukukhulisa amabhizinisi abo kodwa ukwenza ngcono ingcebo okwabelwana ngayo kanye nokuchuma emiphakathini abalima kuyona.

src_text: they must heal the deep divisions of our past.
tgt_text: kumele bapholise ama nxeba obandlululo lwesikhathi sethu esedlule.

src_text: they must dispel the stereotype that only white farmers are commercially successful in south africa, and that black farmers are perpetually ‘emerging.’in working this land; in turning it to productive use, they will indeed turn swords into ploughshares.
tgt_text: kumele bayichithe inkolelo ethi abalimi abamhlophe kuphela abaphumelelayo ekuthengiseni eningizimu afrika, nokuthi abalimi aba nsundu bahlale 'befufusa.

src_text: they will become the faces of national reconciliation.
tgt_text: ukuguqula umkhakha wezolimo vukuzenzele unnamed kamuva nje, umnyango wezolimo, ukuguqulwa komhlaba kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya (idlrd) wamemezela ukuthi amalungu omphakathi azokwazi ukufaka izicelo zokuqasha umhlaba wombuso ongamahe ktha ayizi700 000 ongasetshenziswa noma ohleli nje ezifundazweni eziyisikhombisa.

src_text: building a society that works vukuzenzele unnamed the launch of the presidential employment stimulus last week marks a fundamental shift in our ap proach to tackling unem ployment.
tgt_text: sivuselela umnotho osebenzayo vukuzenzele unnamed ukwethulwa komzamo kamongameli wokusungula imisebenzi ngesonto eledlule kuwuphawu lomnyakazo oyisisekelo ekubhe kaneni kwethu noku swelakala kwemisebe nzi.

src_text: we are undertaking a farreaching and ambitious public investment in human capital, with the state as both a creator and an enabler of jobs.
tgt_text: sithatha igxathu elifinyelela kude nelivelele lokutshala izimali zikahulumeni kuba ntu, ngokuthi uhulumeni abe ngumsunguli futhi abe ngumhlinzeki wemisebe nzi.

src_text: the presidential employment stimulus is unprecedented in its scale and breadth, involving a public investment of r100 billion over the next three years.
tgt_text: umzamo kamongameli wokusungula imisebenzi uyingqayizivele ngobubanzi bawo, ubandakanya utshalomali lukahulumeni oluyizigi digidi eziyir100 eminyakeni emithathu ezayo.

src_text: we will protect and create directlyfunded jobs and livelihood support interventions while the labour market recovers from the coronavirus pandemic.
tgt_text: sizovikela futhi sisungule imisebenzi exhaswe ngqo kanye nokungenelela ekwesekeni izindlela zokuziphi lisa ngesikhathi imakethe yezabasebenzi isalulama kubhubhane lwegciwane lecorona.

src_text: each of these is ready for implementation, and is additional to existing commitments.
tgt_text: konke lokhu sekume ngomumo ukuthi kuqale ukusebenza, futhi kwengeza ezibophezelweni ezikhona.

src_text: while some of the interventions build on the strengths of existing programmes, the stimulus also includes new and innovative approaches.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi ezinye izi ndlela zokungenelela za khela phezu kwamandla ezinhlelo ezivele zikhona, lo mzamo nawo ubandakanya izindlela ezintsha nezisu ngulwe kabusha.

src_text: this includes a focus on what we have termed ‘social employment’.
tgt_text: lokhu kubandakanya ukugxila kwesikubiza 'ngokuqashwa komphakathi'.

src_text: we are working from the premise that there is no shortage of work to be done to address the many social problems in our society.
tgt_text: sisebenzela phezu kokuthi awukho umsebenzi ongenziwa ukubhekana nezinkinga zenhlalo eziningi emphakathini wethu.

src_text: the aim is to support the considerable creativity, initiative and institutional capabilities that exist in the wider society to engage people in work that serves the common good.
tgt_text: inhloso ngukuseka amakho no okudala, okusungula ka nye nawezikhungo akhona emphakathini ngobubanzi ukusebenzisana nabantu abenza umsebenzi ofanayo omuhle.

src_text: this work cuts across a range of themes, including food security, ending genderbased violence, informal settlement upgrading and much more.
tgt_text: lo msebenzi ugamanxa ezinhlakeni ezihlukahlukene, kubandaka nya ukuvikeleka kokudla, ukuqeda udlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile, ukuthuthukiswa kwemijo ndolo nokunye.

src_text: this will supplement the efforts of the public sector, allowing for greater scale and social impact as well as new forms of partnership with diverse social actors.
tgt_text: lokhu kuzohambisana nemizamo yomkhakha kahulumeni, okuzovumela ubukhulu nokuthinteka kwenhlalo kanjalo nokwakheka kobudlelwano obusha nababambiqhaza abehlukene emphakathini.

src_text: the stimulus includes a new national programme to employ teaching and school assistants in schools.
tgt_text: umzamo wokusungula imisebenzi ubandakanya uhlelo olusha lukazwelonke lokuqasha abasizi bothisha nabezikole ezikoleni.

src_text: schools are making these appointments right now, delivering new opportunities in every community across the length and breadth of the country.
tgt_text: izikole kuyimanje ziyaqasha, zethula amathuba amasha kuyo yonke imiphakathi kulolonke izwe.

src_text: public employment is not just for unskilled work.
tgt_text: ukuqashwa komphakathi akuwona nje umsebenzi ongenakhono.

src_text: there is a crosscutting focus on graduates, with opportunities for nurses, science graduates, artisans and others.
tgt_text: kugxilwe kakhulu kulabo abaneziqu, abanamathuba obuhlengikazi, abaneziqu zesayensi, abanamakhono omsebenzi wezandla kanye nabanye.

src_text: the stimulus will also protect jobs in vulnerable sectors that have been hit hard by the pandemic.
tgt_text: umzamo wokusungula imisebenzi uzophinde uvikele imisebenzi emikha kheni entekenteke eshayeke kanzima ngubhubhane.

src_text: support will be provided to early childhood development practitioners, mainly selfemployed women.
tgt_text: ukwesekwa kuzohli nzekelwa abasebenzi bo kuthuthukisa ukukhuliswa kwabantwana, ikakhulukazi abesifazane abaziqashe bona.

src_text: over 74,000 small farmers will also receive production input grants.
tgt_text: abalimi abancane abanga phezu kwezi74 000 nabo bazohlomula ezibonelelweni zomkhiqizo.

src_text: as a nation, we need arts and culture to lift our spirits once more – the stimulus provides new funding to help the sector back onto its feet, including support to digital contentcreation and expansion of ecommerce platforms.
tgt_text: njengesizwe, sidinga ubuciko nesiko ukuphakamisa umoya wethu futhi umzamo wokusungula imisebenzi uhlinzeka ngoxhasomali olusha oluzosiza ukuthi umkhakha ubuyele uzimele, kubandakanya ukweseka ukusungulwa kolwazi ngedijithali kanye nokwandisa izinkundla zokuthengiselana ngeinthanethi.

src_text: this will enable artists to adapt to the new market conditions that the pandemic has imposed on us all and to seize new opportunities for growth.
tgt_text: lokhu kuzovumela amaciko ukuthi ashintshele kuzimo ezintsha zemakethe ezilethwe ngubhubhane kithina nokubamba amathuba amasha ukuze akhule.

src_text: a critical enabler for wider job creation, made more important by the pandemic, is connectivity.
tgt_text: umsunguli obucayi wemisebenzi eminingi, owenziwe wabaluleka kakhulu ngenxa yobhubhane, ukuxhumana.

src_text: to overcome the digital divide, the stimulus will provide affordable, highspeed broadband to lowincome households through innovative connection subsidies and the expansion of free public wifi.
tgt_text: ukunqoba ukwahlukana kwezedijithali, lo mzamo uzohlinzeka ngesivinini sokusebenza kweinthanethi, esingabizi kakhulu kuma khaya anemalingeniso enca ne ngokusebenzisa uxhaso olusha lwezokuxhumana nokufakwa kwewifi yamahhala emphakathini.

src_text: as our country recovers from the devastation of the coronavirus pandemic, we are in no doubt as to the size of the task before us.
tgt_text: njengoba izwe lethu lilulama kubhubhane olubi lwe gciwane lecorona, asingabazi neze ngomsebenzi omkhulu osasimele phambi kwethu.

src_text: we have to achieve an economic recovery that is swift and inclusive.
tgt_text: kumele sizuze ukuvusele lwa komnotho okusheshayo futhi okubandakanya wo nke umuntu.

src_text: we have to get as many of our people as possible working again.
tgt_text: kumele senze ukuthi abantu bakithi abaningi baqalise ukusebenza futhi.

src_text: we also have to regain lost ground in the provision of basic services and critical infrastructure, addressing social challenges and transforming townships and rural communities too.
tgt_text: kumele futhi sizithole ukuthi simephi mayelana nokuhlinzekwa kwezinsiza eziyisisekelo nengqalasizinda ebucayi, ukubhekana nezinselele zenhlalo kanye nokuguqulwa kwamalokishi nemiphakathi yasemakhaya.

src_text: public employment is an instrument that can do all of the above: creating jobs at scale in the short term while markets recover, and creating social value in the process.
tgt_text: ukuqashwa komphakathi kungakwenza konke lokhu okungenhla: ukusungula imisebenzi yesikhathi esifu shane ngesikhathi izimakethe zisalulama, kanye nokusu ngula ubugugu bomphakathi sikhathi sinye.

src_text: the example is often cited of the massive public works programme undertaken by the united states after the great depression in the 1930s.
tgt_text: isibonelo sihlale sishiwo ohlelweni olukhulu lo msebenzi womphakathi owenziwa imelika emva kwesehlakalo esinzima sokuwa komnotho igreat depression ngeminyaka ye1930.

src_text: this was not just a stimulus, but also promoted social participation and inclusion.
tgt_text: lokhu kwakungewona nje umzamo, kodwa kwagqugquzela ukubamba iqhaza komphakathi nokuzibandakanya.

src_text: there are several examples of innovative public employment programmes in the developing world, including in india, ethiopia and here in south africa.
tgt_text: ziningi izibonelo zezi nhlelo ezintsha zemisebenzi yomphakathi emhlabeni othuthukayo, kubandakanya iindia, iethopia kanye nalapha eningizimu afrika.

src_text: these programmes make a direct investment in local economies, reaching poorer areas first, supporting local small enterprises and trickling up into the wider economy from there.
tgt_text: lezi zinhlelo zitshala ngqo izimali eminothweni yase khaya, zifinyelela ezindawe ni ezihlwempu kuqala, ze seka amabhizinisi asekhaya amancane bese ziqhubeke njalo ukusuka lapho ngobubanzi bomnotho.

src_text: they also promote social participation and inclusion, providing communities with the means to change their lives as they undertake new forms of work.
tgt_text: ziphinde zigqugquzele ukubamba iqhaza komphakathi nokuzibandakanya, ngokuhlinzeka imiphakathi ngezindlela zokushintsha izimpilo zayo ngokuthatha umsebenzi omusha.

src_text: in doing so, they contribute to transformation both at a local level and within broader society.
tgt_text: ngokwenza njalo, zifaka isandla ekwenzeni izinguquko ezi ngeni lasekhaya kanye na semphakathini ngobubanzi.

src_text: direct public investment to support employment and create economic opportunities that generate social value does more than just tackle the unemployment crisis.
tgt_text: ukutshala ngqo izimali emphakathini ukuze kwesekwe imisebenzi noku sungula amathuba omnotho azokhiqiza ubugugu bo mphakathi kwenza oku ngaphezu nje kokubhekana nesimo esinzima sokuswe lakala kwemisebenzi.

src_text: it is responsive, because it uses the state’s resources to respond to local community needs, be it for greener spaces, food security, more early childhood development centres, or for better and more accessible roads.
tgt_text: kuyaphenduleka, ngoba kusetshenziswa izinsiza zikahulumeni ukubhekana nezidingo zomphakathi, ku ngaba amathafa, ukuvikelwa kokudla, ezinye izikhungo zokuthuthukiswa koku khula kwabantwana, noma ukwenza ngcono imigwaqo futhi ifinyeleleke kalula.

src_text: it is progressive, because it offers social protection and income security to those who face destitution because they are unable to find work.
tgt_text: kuyinqubekelaphambili, ngoba kuhlinzeka ngokuvikelwa komphakathi nemalingeniso evikelekile kulabo ababhekene nenhlu pheko ngenxa yokungakwa zi ukuthola umsebenzi.

src_text: it is an investment in the future, in that it supports the broader economic recovery agenda by urgently getting our people to work on improving our national and municipal infrastructure.
tgt_text: lokhu kungukubekelela ikusasa, ngenxa yokuthi kusekela uhlelo lokuvuse lelwa komnotho ngokuthola ngokuphuthuma okukhulu ukuthi abantu bethu basebenze ukwenza ngcono ingqalasizinda yethu kuzwelonke nakomasipala.

src_text: through the interventions in the stimulus, we are creating work for those who need it, while leaving a lasting impact on entire communities.
tgt_text: ngokungenelela emizameni, sisungula imisebenzi kulabo abayidingayo, ngesikhathi sishiya umphumela oyohlezi ukhona njalo emi phakathini yonke.

src_text: like public employment programmes across the world, this employment stimulus supports and complements the critical role of the private sector in creating jobs.
tgt_text: njengezinye izinhlelo zomsebenzi womphakathi emhlabeni jikelele, lo mzamo wamathuba emisebenzi usekela futhi ugcwalisa iqhaza elibalulekile lomkhakha ozimele ekusunguleni imisebenzi.

src_text: it is countercyclical, in that as the recovery advances, the scale of public employment will decline.
tgt_text: kuyaphambanake, ukuthi uma ukuvuselelwa komnotho kukhuphuka, izinga lemisebenzi emphakathini lizokwehla.

src_text: the work experience and skills acquired by beneficiaries of the presidential employment stimulus will improve their prospects of securing formal employment.
tgt_text: isipiliyoni somsebenzi namakhono azotholwa ngaba zuze kumzamo kamongame li wokusungula imisebenzi kuzovuselela amathemba okuqashwa ngokusemthe thweni.

src_text: the experience gained is also a pathway to entrepreneurial activity.
tgt_text: isipiliyoni esitholiwe futhi siyindlela eholela ekuziqa leleni ibhizinisi lakho.

src_text: participants will improve their skills and capabilities to start their own businesses, and can use the steady income provided by public employment to branch out into other incomegenerating activities.
tgt_text: aba bambe iqhaza bazothuthu kisa amakhono abo kanye nolwazi lwabo ukuze baqale awabo amabhizinisi, futhi bangasebenzisa imalingeniso ehlinzekwe ngemisebenzi yomphakathi ukuziqalela eminye imisebenzi engabe nzela imali.

src_text: i have consistently affirmed that the covid19 crisis is also a window of opportunity to build back better.
tgt_text: ngiqinisekisile ngoku ngaguquki ukuthi isimo esibi secovid19 siyintuba yethuba lokuphinde sakhe kangcono.

src_text: at this time of great upheaval, we would be doing ourselves no favours by making unrealistic promises that raise expectations, only to come short when they are not met.
tgt_text: kulesi sikhathi sesiphithiphithi, siyobe asizenzeli kahle uma senza izithembiso ezingeke zifezeke ezinyusa amathemba, bese siya phoxeka uma zingafezeki.

src_text: this is why each of the jobs and livelihood support interventions is fully funded, with a clear implementation plan.
tgt_text: yingakho omunye nomunye wemisebenzi nokungenelela kokusekela indlela yokuziphilisa kuxhaswe ngoku gcwele, nohlelo olucace bha lokuqalisa ukusebenza.

src_text: the employment stimulus is not about vague commitments for some time in the future, but about jobs being created right here and now.
tgt_text: umzamo wokusungula imisebenzi awusikho nje ukuzibophezela okufi phele kwesikhathi esithile esikhathini esizayo, kodwa umayelana nokusungulwa kwemisebenzi lapha futhi njengamanje.

src_text: the stimulus is the result of extensive consultation with national departments, provinces and metros to rapidly design employment pro grammes that can be rolled out or expanded within six months.
tgt_text: umzamo wokusungula imisebenzi ungumphumela wokubonisana okujulile neminyango kazwelonke, yezi fundazwe kanye nomasipala ukuze kwakhiwe ngokushe sha izinhlelo zomsebenzi ezizoqala ukusebenza noma zisatshalaliswe ezinyangeni eziyisithupha.

src_text: the implementing departments and other stakeholders were rigorously assessed on their capacity to implement.
tgt_text: iminyango ezoqalisa imisebenzi kanye nabanye ababambiqhaza bahlolisiswa ukuthi bazokwazi yini ukuqalisa le misebenzi.

src_text: in every one of the programmes that fall under the stimulus, opportunities will be widely advertised and recruitment will be fair, open and transparent.
tgt_text: kuzozonke izinhlelo ezingaphansi komzamo wokusungula imisebenzi, amathuba emisebenzi azo khangiswa futhi nokuqa shwa kuzoba neqiniso, kuvu leleke futhi kube sobala.

src_text: the goals we have set ourselves are realistic, measura ble and achievable, and draw lessons from past experience and international best prac tice.
tgt_text: imigomo esizibekele yona eyangempela, iyisilinganiso esilungile futhi iyafezeka, futhi inezifundo kwesidlule kukhona kanye nemisebenzi emihle yomhlaba.

src_text: our people are ready and willing to work.
tgt_text: abantu bakithi bame ngomumo futhi bazimisele ngo kusebenza.

src_text: this vast potential must be harnessed, and our collective skills and capabilities brought to bear in rebuilding our country in the wake of the coronavirus.
tgt_text: la mandla ama khulu kumele aboshelwe, namakhono nolwazi lwethu oluhlangene sikusebenzise ukwakha kabusha izwe lethu emva kwegciwane lecorona.

src_text: the presidential employment stimulus provides a respite for families who have endured a long hard winter with greatly reduced income, and for individuals who have spent many years without work.
tgt_text: umzamo kamongameli wokusungula imisebenzi wethula umthwalo emindenini ebibekezelele ubusika obude obunzima ngemali ngeniso eyehliswe kakhulu, nalabo bantu asebephile iminyaka eminingi bengasebenzi.

src_text: real, decent work is the right of every human being.
tgt_text: ngempela, umsebenzi ohloniphekile uyilungelo lawowonke umuntu.

src_text: it is a precondition for economic growth and social stability.
tgt_text: ku ngumbandela wokukhula komnotho nokuzinza ko mphakathi.

src_text: by giving effect to this fundamental right, the presidential employment stimulus is making a decisive contribution to building a society that works.
tgt_text: sivuselela umnotho osebenzayo vukuzenzele unnamed ukwethulwa komzamo kamongameli wokusungula imisebenzi ngesonto eledlule kuwuphawu lomnyakazo oyisisekelo ekubhe kaneni kwethu noku swelakala kwemisebe nzi.

src_text: recovery on the horizon for sa vukuzenzele unnamed the jacaranda trees are in full bloom across the nation’s capital, heralding the start of summer.
tgt_text: sekuqala ukuntwela ezansi eningizimu afrika vukuzenzele unnamed izihlahla zejacaranda ziqhakazile kwinhlo kodolobha yesizwe, zenanela ukungena kwehlobo.

src_text: after a long and difficult winter, the beginning of a new season should fill us with optimism.
tgt_text: emva kobusika obude futhi obunzima, ukuqala kwesikhathi so nyaka esisha kumele ku gcwalise amathemba.

src_text: when the national state of disaster was declared in march, our immediate priority was to contain the spread of the virus and provide emergency relief to citizens, communities, workers and businesses.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi kumenye zelwa isimo senhlekelele kazwelonke ngondasa, okwaba seqhulwini kuthi na kwakungukunqanda ukubhebhetheka kwegci wane nokuhlinzeka ngosizo oluphuthumayo kwizakha muzi, imiphakathi, abase benzi kanye namabhizinisi.

src_text: over the course of eight months and with the support of our social partners, we rolled out a comprehensive set of measures to limit the social and economic impact of the pandemic.
tgt_text: esikhathini sezinyanga eziyisishiyagalombili futhi nangokusekelwa ngesiba mbisene nabo emphakathini, sathatha izinyathelo ezinzulu ukuze sinciphise umthelela ongemuhle kwezenhlalo kanye nomnotho owalethwa ubhubhane.

src_text: we massively expanded social protection on a scale that has never been attempted before in this country.
tgt_text: saletha ukuvikelwa ko mphakathi ngezinga elinga kaze libonwe phambilini kuleli lizwe.

src_text: we are one of the few countries in the world where the right of access to social security is enshrined in the constitution, and we can be proud that during this grave crisis we gave practical expression to this right in many ways.
tgt_text: singelinye la mazwe ambalwa emhlabeni lapho ilungelo lokuthola ukuvikeleka kwezenhlalo lishicilelwe kumthethosi sekelo, futhi singazishaya isifuba ukuthi ngesikhathi salolu sizi olungaka sibonisile ukunikezela ngaleli lungelo ngezindlela eziningi.

src_text: in addition to our existing social grants, which reach more than 17 million people every month, we toppedup the old age, disability and child support grants.
tgt_text: ukwengeza ezibonelelweni zethu ezikhona, ezitholwa ngabantu abangaphezu kwe zigidi eziyi17 nyanga zonke, sengeze izibonelelo zabantu abadala, ezabantu abaphi la nokukhubazeka kanye nesibonelelo sabantwa na.

src_text: we rolled out a special coronavirus disease (covid19) social relief of distress grant, which has reached some six million people to date.
tgt_text: saqalisa isibonelelo sokusiza esiyisipesheli secovid19 , esesitholwe ngabantu abayizigidi eziyi sithupha kuze kube manje.

src_text: this was done within weeks of the national state of disaster being declared.
tgt_text: lokhu kwenzeka emavikini okumenyezelwa kwesimo senhlekelele kazwelonke.

src_text: the scale of such an undertaking cannot be understated.
tgt_text: umsebenzi ongaka angeke wabukelwa phansi neze.

src_text: to bring this system online there was extensive collaboration between the south african social security agency, south african revenue service, home affairs and many others.
tgt_text: ukuze lolu hlelo lusebenze kwaba nokusebenza ngo kubambisana phakathi kwenhlangano yezimpe sheni nezibonelelo zikahu lumeni eningizimu afrika, umnyango wokuqoqwa kwentela eningizimu afri ka, umnyango wezasekhaya kanye neminye eminingi.

src_text: we set up a fully automated application and disbursement process, and integrated multiple databases, including the national population register and the unemployment insurance fund (uif) database.
tgt_text: senza uhlelo lokuzifakela izicelo nokukhokheleka, futhi lwahambisana nemini ningwane eyehlukene, oku bandakanya uhlu lwenani labantu eningizimu afrika kanye nemininingwane ye sikhwama somshwalense wabantu abalahlekelwe umsebenzi (iuif).

src_text: we set up new application channels like whatsapp and ussd, and created systems with the commercial banks to enable banking detail verification.
tgt_text: sabeka izindlela ezintsha zokufaka izicelo njengakuwhatsapp kanye neussd, sasungula nohlelo lokusebenzisana namabhange ukuze sikwazi ukuqinisekisa imininingwa ne yasebhange.

src_text: this is a remarkable achievement in a very short space of time.
tgt_text: lena yimpu melelo eyisimanga esikha thini esifushane kangaka.

src_text: alongside the measures we took to protect and sustain livelihoods, we also supported ailing businesses.
tgt_text: ezinye izinyathelo esizi thathile ukuvikela nokugci na izindlela zokuphila kwabantu, siphinde sasekela amabhizinisi awayo.

src_text: we provided relief to small businesses in the form of debt relief, finance, tax payment deferrals and other instruments.
tgt_text: sihli nzeke ngosizo kumabhizinisi amancane olufana nokusizwa ngezikweledu, ukuxhaswa ngezimali, ukuhlehliswa kokukhokhela intela kanye nezinye izinsizakusebenza.

src_text: we implemented a covid19 loan guarantee scheme to enable businesses to meet their operational expenses during the lockdown, and are currently looking at how this scheme can reach more companies in need.
tgt_text: saqalisa uhlelo lwecovid19 lokuqinise kiswa kwemalimboleko ukuze amabhizinisi akwazi ukubhekana nezindlela zawo zokuqhuba amabhizinisi nge sikhathi sokuvalwa kwezwe, futhi sisabheka ukuthi lolu hlelo lungafinyelela kanjani ezinkampanini eziningi ezi ludingayo.

src_text: we provided income protection to workers and relief to business owners through the temporary employer relief scheme administered by the uif.
tgt_text: sahlinzeka ngokuvikelwa kwemalingeniso kubasebenzi kanye noxhaso kubanikazi bamabhizinisi ngohlelo lwe sikhashana loxhaso lwa baqashi oluphethwe iuif.

src_text: these were all in direct response to an emergency and were by nature temporary.
tgt_text: konke lokhu kwakuyindle la yokubhekana ngqo ne simo esiphuthumayo futhi kwakungokwesikhashana.

src_text: some are now coming to an end, while others have been extended as the labour market recovers.
tgt_text: okunye sekuyaphela manje, ngesikhathi okunye kwelu liwe njengoba imisebenzi ivuselelwa.

src_text: the measures we implemented went a long way towards protecting our society from the harsh winds of covid19.
tgt_text: izinyathelo esazithatha zasiza kakhulu ekuvike leni umphakathi wakithi kwimimoya enamandla yecovid19 .

src_text: the additional grants helped to prevent millions of people from falling below the food poverty line.
tgt_text: izibonelelo ezengeziwe zasiza ukugwe ma ukuthi izigidi zabantu zikhahlamezwe ububha.

src_text: had we not intervened to secure livelihoods and save businesses, the living conditions of our people and the circumstances of thousands of businesses would have been considerably worse.
tgt_text: ukube asingenelelanga ukuvikela indlela yoku phila kwabantu futhi sisindi se amabhizinisi, izimo zo kuphila zabantu bakithi nezimo zezinkulungwane zamabhizinisi ngabe zaba nzima kakhulu.

src_text: now we are in a transition from relief to recovery.
tgt_text: manje sesikwinguquko sisuka kusizo siya ekulula meni.

src_text: the emergency measures we put in place have laid a firm foundation on which to rebuild our economy.
tgt_text: izinyathelo eziphuthumayo esizibekile zibe yisisekelo esiqinile esingakhela kusona umnotho wethu.

src_text: as our focus now shifts to the implementation of the economic reconstruction and recovery plan, our priority will be to stimulate growth and create jobs.
tgt_text: njengoba ukugxila kwethu sekubheke ekuqalisweni kokusebenza kohlelo lokwakha kabusha nokuvuselela umnotho, okuseqhulwini kuzoba uku khuthaza ukukhula nokusu ngula imisebenzi.

src_text: there has already been progress in a number of areas.
tgt_text: sekube nenqubekelapha mbili ezindaweni eziningi.

src_text: we are seeing new funding commitments for infrastructure development following an infrastructure project roundtable last week.
tgt_text: sithola iminikelo embalwa yoxhaso lokuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda kula ndela umhlangano wangevi ki eledlule owawumayelana nomsebenzi wengqalasizi nda.

src_text: a number of employment programmes under the presidential employment stimulus have started.
tgt_text: izinhlelo eziningi zemi sebenzi ngaphansi kohlelo lukamongameli lokusu ngula imisebenzi seziqalile.

src_text: we are pushing ahead with economic reforms in areas such as energy and telecommunications.
tgt_text: siqhubekela phambili nge zinguquko zomnotho ezi ndaweni ezifana nezamandla kanye nezokuxhumana.

src_text: plans are being converted to action and commitments are being reflected in jobs and opportunities.
tgt_text: izinhlelo ziguqulwa zibe izenzo kanye nokuzinikela kuyabonakala emisebenzini nasemathubeni.

src_text: it is all the more critical at this time, more so with the festive season approaching, that we do not become the architects of our own undoing.
tgt_text: konke kubalulekile kulesi sikhathi, ikakhulukazi ngoba kusondela isikhathi samaho lide, ukuthi kungabi yithina esisonga izandla.

src_text: the greatest vigilance is required from us all to keep the virus at bay.
tgt_text: ukuqaphelisisa okukhulu kuyadingeka kithina sonke ukugcina igciwane liphansi.

src_text: a resurgence at any scale will not just dramatically reverse our health gains.
tgt_text: ukukhuphuka kwegci wane kuye kunoma iliphi izinga angeke nje kuhlehlise esesikuzuzile kwezempilo.

src_text: it will choke the green shoots of economic recovery that have emerged, and take us back from spring to winter.
tgt_text: kuzodicilela phansi imizamo esebenzayo yokuvuselela umnotho ebisikhona, futhi kusibuyisele emuva sisuka kwintwasahlobo siye ebu sika.

src_text: to prevent a second wave of covid19 infections, we must observe the public health guidelines that remain in place.
tgt_text: ukugwema ihlandla lesibili lokusuleleka ngecovid19 , kumele silandele imihla hlandlela yezempilo yompha kathi elokhu ikhona.

src_text: when we fail to wear a mask at a social gathering, when we attend crowded events, we are not only putting ourselves and others at risk.
tgt_text: uma sihluleka ukugqoka isifonyo uma sihlangene emphakathini, uma sithamele imicimbi enabantu abaningi, asibeki thina nabanye ku phela engozini.

src_text: we are also putting our economic recovery in jeopardy.
tgt_text: sibeka futhi nokuvuseleleka komnotho wethu engcupheni.

src_text: let us all continue to play our part.
tgt_text: masiqhubeke sidlale indima yethu.

src_text: the positive actions of wearing a mask, of maintaining social distancing and of regular hand washing helped us overcome the worst effects of the pandemic.
tgt_text: izenzo zethu ezilungi le zokugqoka isifonyo, zokuqhelelana kanye no kuhlanza izandla njalo kusisizile ukudlula ebungo zini bobhubhane.

src_text: they are still our best defence.
tgt_text: kuseyizo izikhali zethu ezihamba phambili.

src_text: let us remember the sacrifices we all had to make to contain the spread of the virus in the early days.
tgt_text: masikhumbule ukuzinikela sonke esikwenzile ukunqa nda ukubhebhetheka kwegci wane ezinsukwini zokuqala.

src_text: even as most social and economic activity has resumed, we must still observe all the health measures.
tgt_text: ngisho imisebenzi eminingi yomphakathi neyomnotho isiqalile, kumele siqhubeke nokulandela izinyathelo ze zempilo.

src_text: this is absolutely necessary if we are to rebuild our economy and put this crisis behind us.
tgt_text: sekuqala ukuntwela ezansi eningizimu afrika vukuzenzele unnamed izihlahla zejacaranda ziqhakazile kwinhlo kodolobha yesizwe, zenanela ukungena kwehlobo.

src_text: sa overcoming hiv and aids vukuzenzele unnamed as we continue our efforts to manage the devastating coronavirus pandemic, we cannot ignore the other public health challenges that our country faces.
tgt_text: iningizimu afrika inqoba isandulela ngculazi (ihiv) kanye nengculazi (iaids) vukuzenzele unnamed njengoba siqhubeka nezinyathelo zethu zokulawula ubhubhane lwegciwane lecorona olukhahlamezayo, singeze neze sazishaya indiva ezinye izingqinamba zempilo yomphakathi ezibhekene nezwe lethu.

src_text: for more than three dec ades, our country has been engaged in an ongoing struggle against hiv and aids, which has cost many lives and caused great hardship and suffering.
tgt_text: sekungaphezu kweminyaka engamashumi amathathu, izwe lethu lazibandakanya emzukuzukwini oqhubekayo wokulwa nehiv kanye neaids, osekudlule nemiphefumulo yabantu abaningi futhi kwadala ubunzima ezimpilweni zabantu kanye nokuhlupheka.

src_text: since the outbreak of cov id19 in the country, with the nationwide lockdown and the pressure on our health facilities, many hiv , aids and tuberculosis services have suffered.
tgt_text: selokhu kwabheduka icovid19 ezweni, okwaba nokuvalwa kwezwe jikelele kanye nengcindezi kwizinsiza zethu zezempilo, ziningi izinsiza zehiv , zeaids kanye nesifo sofuba ezikhinyabezekile.

src_text: this has posed a challenge for people testing and starting antiretroviral treatment.
tgt_text: lokhu kuphose inselele kubantu abahlolayo kanye nabaqala imishanguzo yokudambisa igciwane.

src_text: many people found it difficult to collect their medicines and fewer people accessed other services, such as voluntary male medical circumcision.
tgt_text: baningi abantu abakuthola kunzima kakhulu ukuyolanda imithi yabo futhi bancane abantu aba kwazi ukufinyelela kwezinye izinsiza nje, ezifana nokusokwa kwabesilisa ngokuzithandela.

src_text: at the same time, there are many lessons that have been learnt from our public health response to the coronavirus pandemic that can strengthen our fight against hiv and tb.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi esifanayo, ziningi izifundo esizifunde ngezempilo yomphakathi wethu ekubhekaneni nobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona nokungasiqinisa amandla empini yokubhekana nehiv kanye nesifo sofuba.

src_text: south africa continues to have the largest number of people living with hiv in the world.
tgt_text: iningizimu afrika isalokhu iqhubeka nokuhamba phambili ngokuba nesibalo esiphezulu sabantu abaphila nehivemhlabeni jikelele.

src_text: it is encouraging, however, that over the last decade we made progress in reducing the number of new hiv infections in the population by nearly 60%.
tgt_text: noma kunjalo, kuyakhuthaza, ukuthi eminyakeni eyishumi eyedlule sikwazile ukuba nenqubekelaphambili yokwehlisa izinga lokwesuleleka okusha ngegciwane lehiv emphakathini onenanibantu elilinganiselwa kuma60%.

src_text: it is also encouraging that hiv infections in adolescent girls and young women have significantly declined in the last decade.
tgt_text: kuyakhuthaza futhi ukuthi ukwesuleleka ngehiv kwamantombazane asethombile kanye nabesifazane abasebancane kwehle ngamalengiso eminyakeni eyishumi eyedlule.

src_text: this is a crucial group because they are much more likely to be at risk of getting hiv .
tgt_text: leli yiqembu elibalulekile ngoba liyaye libe sengcupheni enkulu yokuthi lisuleleke ngehiv .

src_text: our treatment programme has contributed to a reduction in the number of deaths due to aids by 60%.
tgt_text: uhlelo lwethu lokwelapha selufake isandla ekwehliseniinani labantu ababulawa yiaids ngamaphesenti angama60.

src_text: there has been a greater reduction in hivrelated deaths among young people.
tgt_text: sekube nokwehla ngamalengiso ukushona kwabantu abasha okuhlobene nehiv .

src_text: it was possible to reduce the number of deaths because we, together with our partners, have rolled out an extensive antiretroviral programme reaching millions of people living with the disease.
tgt_text: kube lula ukwehlisa inani labashonayo ngoba, sisebenzisana nalabo ababambe iqhaza, siqalise ngohlelo lwemishanguzo eﬁ nyelela kubantu abayizigidi abaphila nalesi sifo.

src_text: at the beginning of the decade, our programme to prevent mother to child transmission (pmtct) of hiv had very low coverage.
tgt_text: ekuqaleni kweminyaka eyishumi, uhlelo lwethu lokuvikela ukwesuleleka ngesandulela ngculazi okuqhamuka kumama kuya enganeni (ipmtct) kube kuncane kakhulu.

src_text: now we have one of the highest rates of coverage of pmtct in southern africa, which has substantially reduced rates of infection among children.
tgt_text: njengamanje sesinezinga eliphezulu kakhulu lepmtct ngaseningizimu neafrika, osekuphinde kwehlisa kakhulu izinga lokwesuleleka ezinganeni.

src_text: while we have reduced deaths and new infections, we still are far from reaching the goal we committed ourselves in 2016 of achieving a 75% reduction in hiv infections by 2020. if we succeed in doing so, we are likely to end aids as a public health threat by 2030. unfortunately, we are not there yet.
tgt_text: nakuba sikwehlisile ukushona kanye nokwesuleleka okusha, sisekude kakhulu ekufezeni umgomo wethu esawubekangonyaka wezi2016 wokufinyelela ngempumelelo ekunciphiseni ukwesuleleka ngehiv ngamaphesenti angama75 ngonyaka wezi2020.

src_text: we have to do far more to ensure that young people are empowered to prevent infections, including through changing behaviour, accessing condoms and testing regularly.
tgt_text: uma singaphumelela ekwenzeni lokho, hleze singakwazi ukuqeda iaids njengenye yezinsongo zesihlava esibi kwezempilo yomphakathi ngonyaka wezi2030.

src_text: we need to make sure that everyone who is infected has access to treatment and care.
tgt_text: ngeshwa, asikafiki laphookwamanje.

src_text: we need to work harder on hiv prevention among key populations, including sex workers, men who have sex with men, and people who inject drugs.
tgt_text: kusamele sikhuphule amasokisi ukuze siqi nisekise ukuthi abantu abasha bayakhuthazwa ukuthi banqande ukwesuleleka, kubandakanyaukushintsha indlela yokuziphatha, ukufinyelela kumakhondomu kanye nokuhlala ngokuhlolela leli gciwane.

src_text: we must end the stigma and discrimination towards these populations.
tgt_text: kufanele siqinisekise ukuthi noma ngubani osehaqwe yileli gciwane uyakwazi ukuﬁ nyelela ekwelashweni kanye nasekunakekelweni.

src_text: we cannot hope to end hiv if we ignore the needs, concerns and rights of any part of our population.
tgt_text: kufanele ukuthi sisebenze ngokuzikhandla ekunqandeni ihiv phakathi kwabantu abahamba phambili ekwesulelekeni, okubandakanya abadayisa ngomzimba, abesilisa abazibandakanya ocansini nabanye besilisa, kanye nabantu abazijova ngezidakamizwa.

src_text: south africa needs to increase efforts to medically circumcise young men to reduce their risk of acquiring hiv .
tgt_text: kumele siqede ukucwaswa kanye nobandlululo olubhekiswe kulaba bantu.

src_text: unsafe circumcision should not leave young men with lifelong health problems, and no one should die from circumcision.
tgt_text: singeze neze sazinika ithemba lokuthi singaqeda ihiv uma sisaziba izidingo, ukukhathazeka kanye namalungelo engxenye yenanibantu lakithi.

src_text: we must make sure that young men have safe circumcision.
tgt_text: iningizimu afrika kufanele ukuthi ikhuphule amasokisi ezinyathelweni zayo zokuthi kusokwe abesilisa abasha ukuze kuncishiswe ubungozi bokuthi bathole ihiv .

src_text: we are encouraged by findings of a recent study on preexposure prophylaxis (prep).
tgt_text: ukusokwa okungaphephile akumele neze kugcine kunika abesilisa abasha izinkinga zempilo zangunaphakade, futhi akukho namunye okufanele ukuthi abulawe ukusokwa.

src_text: unlike antiretroviral treatment that is given to people who are hiv positive, prep involves the regular use of antiretroviral drugs by hiv negative people to prevention infection.
tgt_text: kumele siqinisekise ukuthi abesilisa abasebasha basokwa ngendlela ephephile.

src_text: the study, conducted by scientists from the hiv prevention trials network, found that longacting injections once every eight weeks was better than the daily tablet used for hiv prevention.
tgt_text: sigqugquzelwa yimiphumela yocwaningo lwakamuva olumayelana nezindlela zokuvikelwa kwesandulela ngculazi ipreexposure prophylaxis( iprep).

src_text: these findings have the potential to significantly strengthen our response to the epidemic.
tgt_text: alufani nemishanguzo yokwelapha yona enikwa abantu asebevele behaqwe yihiv , iprep ihlanganisa phakathiukusetshenziswa njalo kwezidakamizwa zemishanguzo ngabantu abangakahaqwa yihiv ukuze kunqandwe ukwesuleleka.

src_text: if we are to succeed in ending aids as a public health threat within the next decade, we need to combine these medical breakthroughs with fundamental changes in behaviour.
tgt_text: ucwaningo, olwenziwe ngososayensi bethimba lehiv prevention trials network, luthole ukuthi ukuthola imijovo esebenza isikhathi eside kanye emva kwamaviki ayisishiyagalombili yayingcono kakhulu ukwedlula amaphilisi asetshenziselwa ukunqanda ihiv .

src_text: we also need to tackle the economic and social conditions that contrib ute to high rates of infection.
tgt_text: le miphumela inamandla kakhulu ekuqiniseni amandla ethu okubhekana nalo mqedazwe.

src_text: one of our central tasks is to empower adolescent girls and young women, educationally, economically and socially.
tgt_text: uma sifuna ukuqeda ngempumelelo iaids njengensongo yesihlava sezempilo yomphakathi eminyakeni eyishumi ezayo, kufanele ukuthi sihlanganise le ntuthuko yokwelapha ngokwenza izinguquko ezibalulekile ekuziphatheni.

src_text: they need to be able to make their own decisions about every aspect of their lives, including their sexuality and sexual behaviour.
tgt_text: kufanele futhi ukuthi sibhekane nomnotho kanye nezimo zenhlalo nokuyizona ezinesandla emazingeni aphezulu okwesuleleka.

src_text: ultimately, we will achieve the end of aids through the empowerment of young people, women and other people at risk.
tgt_text: omunye wemisebenzi yethu obaluleke kakhulu ukunika amandla amantombazane asethombile kanye nabesifazane abasha, ngemfundo, ngomnotho kanye nangenhlalo.

src_text: this includes empowerment through access to information, advice and support.
tgt_text: kufanele ukuthi bakwazi ukuthathaizinqumo ngazo zonke izindlela ngempilo yabo, kubandakanya ububili babo kanye nendlela yokuziphatha ehambiselana nezocansi.

src_text: it includes access to education and economic opportunities, especially for young women.
tgt_text: ekugcineni, sizophumelela ekuqedeni iaids ngokunika abantu abasha amandla, abesifazane kanye nabanye abantu abasengcupheni.

src_text: empowerment also means that every person must have access to testing, treatment and other health services.
tgt_text: lokhu kubandakanya ukunikwa amandla ngokukwazi ukufinyelela kulwazi, iseluleko kanye nokusekela.

src_text: the people of south africa have come so far, endured so much and made such great progress in the fight against hiv , aids and tuberculosis.
tgt_text: lokhu kubandakanya ukukwazi ukufinyelela kwimfundo kanye namathubaomnotho, ikakhulukazi abesifazane abasebasha.

src_text: let us intensify both our resolve and our actions to confront and overcome aids once and for all.
tgt_text: iningizimu afrika inqoba isandulela ngculazi (ihiv) kanye nengculazi (iaids) vukuzenzele unnamed njengoba siqhubeka nezinyathelo zethu zokulawula ubhubhane lwegciwane lecorona olukhahlamezayo, singeze neze sazishaya indiva ezinye izingqinamba zempilo yomphakathi ezibhekene nezwe lethu.

src_text: a better 2021 for all south africans the first weeks of the year have been difficult for all south africans.
tgt_text: unyaka wezi2021 ongcono kubantu baseningizimu afrika amaviki okuqala onyaka abe nzima kubo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika.

src_text: vukuzenzele unnamed the coronavirus pandemic has gotten worse, with new infections increasing far faster and far higher than before.
tgt_text: vukuzenzele unnamed ubhubhane lwegciwane lecorona luye lwaba nzima kakhulu, nokusuleleka okusha kwakhuphuka ngesivinini esikhulu futhi kwaya phezulu kakhulu kunakuqala.

src_text: hospitals have been under great strain as more people have needed medical attention.
tgt_text: izibhedlela zibe ngaphansi kwengcindezi enkulu njengoba abantu abaningi bebedinga ukulashwa.

src_text: while most economic sectors have been able to operate again for several months, it will take some time for the economy to recover and for lost jobs to be restored.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi imikhakha yezomnotho eminingi ikwazile ukusebenza futhi izinyanga eziningana, kuzothatha isikhathi ukuthi umnotho uphinde usimame nokubuyiselwa kwemisebenzi elahlekile.

src_text: as the new year starts, many families are still feeling the effects of the pandemic on their lives and livelihoods.
tgt_text: njengoba unyaka omusha uqala, imindeni eminingi isakhahlamezekile ngenxa yobhubhane ezimpilweni zabo nasendleleni yabo yokuphila.

src_text: the world is now entering the second year of the coronavirus pandemic.
tgt_text: umhlaba usungena onyakeni wesibili wobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona.

src_text: for south africa, as for most countries around the world, the year 2021 will be extremely challenging.
tgt_text: iningizimu afrika, njengamanye amazwe amaningi emhlabeni jikelele, unyaka wezi2021 uzoba nenselele kakhulu.

src_text: the second wave of covid19 infections may well be followed by further waves, which will threaten both the health of our people and the recovery of our economy.
tgt_text: ihlandla lesibili lokusuleleka ngecovid19 lingalandelwa ngezinye izigaba zokwesuleleka, okuzobeka engcupheni impilo yabantu bakithi kanye nokuvuselelwa komnotho wethu.

src_text: difficult as this year will be, i am certain that we will overcome the pandemic and set our country firmly on the path to recovery.
tgt_text: noma ngabe lo nyaka uzoba nzima kangakanani, ngiqinisekile ukuthi sizolunqoba lolu bhubhane sibeke izwe lethu endleleni eya ekululameni.

src_text: my confidence comes from the south african people.
tgt_text: ukuzithemba kwami kuvela kubantu baseningizimu afrika.

src_text: if i look at how south africans responded to this crisis from the moment the virus arrived on our shores, i have no doubt that we have the resilience, discipline and ability to defeat this disease.
tgt_text: uma ngibheka indlela abantu baseningizimu afrika ababhekane ngayo nalolu sizi kusuka kwaqubuka igciwane ezweni lakithi, anginalo ungabazane ukuthi siqinile, sineziyalo futhi singakwazi ukunqoba lesi sifo.

src_text: certainly there were exceptions, but the vast majority of south africans understood the need for restrictions on their movement and activities, and complied with the regulations that we had to put in place.
tgt_text: yebo kukhona abebehlukile, kodwa iningi labantu baseningizimu afrika lasiqonda isidingo semikhawulo ekuhambahambeni kanye nasekwenzeni imisebenzi ethile, futhi bayithobela imithethonqubo okwakufanele ibekwe.

src_text: even more important than compliance, most south africans took responsibility for themselves and for others, following advice on issues like social distancing, wearing a mask and hand washing.
tgt_text: futhi okubaluleke ukudlula ukuthobela imithethonqubo, abantu abaningi baseningizimu afrika bazibophezela bona kanye nabanye, ngokulandela iseluleko odabeni olufana nokuqhelelana, ukugqoka isifonyo kanye nokuhlanza izandla.

src_text: and where we fell short, we have, sadly, seen the consequences.
tgt_text: futhi lapho esingenzanga kahle khona, sikwazile, ngebhadi, sikubonile ukushayeka.

src_text: we now know about the risks of closed spaces and crowded gatherings, of not wearing masks and not keeping our distance from others.
tgt_text: manje sesiyazi ngobungozi bezindawo ezivalekile nemibuthano enesiminyaminya, bokungagqoki izifonyo nokungaqhelelani kwabanye.

src_text: this bodes well for the year ahead.
tgt_text: lokhu kuluphawu oluhle onyakeni esiya kuwo.

src_text: we now know much more about the disease and how to prevent its spread.
tgt_text: manje sesazi okuningi ngalesi sifo nokuthi singakugwema kanjani ukubhebhetheka kwaso.

src_text: and despite what one could call ‘pandemic fatigue’, we are no less determined as south africans to do what needs to be done.
tgt_text: naphezu kokuba omunye angakubiza ngokuthi 'ukukhathaliswa ngubhubhane', ukuzimisela kwethu akwehlile neze njengabantu baseningizimu afrika ukuthi senze lokho okumele sikwenze.

src_text: as we adhere even more rigorously to the basic prevention measures, we will also be rolling out a mass vaccination campaign.
tgt_text: njengoba sithobela kakhulu kunakuqala izinyathelo zokugwema ukusuleleka ngegciwane, sizophinde siqalise umkhankaso omkhulu wokugoma.

src_text: as more and more people are vaccinated, we will both save lives and progressively reduce the risk of infection across the population.
tgt_text: uma abantu abaningi begonywa, sizosindisa izimpilo futhi siqhubeke nokunciphisa ubungozi bokusuleleka kubantu.

src_text: getting enough vaccines as quickly as possible – and making sure that they reach the people who need them – will be one of the biggest tasks of the year.
tgt_text: ukuthola imigomo eyanele ngokushesha okukhulu nokuqinisekisa ukuthi ifikelela kubantu abayidingayo kuzoba omunye wemisebenzi emikhulu yonyaka.

src_text: this will be particularly challenging as every country in the world is clamouring to secure a limited supply of vaccines.
tgt_text: lokhu kuzoba yinselele enkulu njengoba wonke amazwe emhlabeni aphuthumela ukuthola imigomo enqunyelwe ekhona.

src_text: but we are hard at work with partners in business, labour and civil society to make this happen.
tgt_text: kodwa sisebenza kanzima nesibambisene nabo ebhizinisini, kwezabasebenzi kanye nomphakathi ukwenza lokhu.

src_text: we are working on several fronts to get vaccines, including through the global covax facility, the african union initiative and through our own engagements with vaccine manufacturers.
tgt_text: sisebenza ngezindlela ezehlukene ukuthola imigomo, okubandakanya ukusebenza nesikhungo somhlaba icovax, uhlelo lobumbano lwamazwe aseafrika kanye nangezingxoxo zethu nabakhiqizi bemigomo.

src_text: as we act together to overcome the pandemic, we will need to work together to rebuild and transform our economy.
tgt_text: njengoba sibambisene ukunqoba ubhubhane, kuzodingeka ukuthi sisebenze ngokubambisana ukwakha kabusha nokuguqula umnotho wethu.

src_text: we have both the ability and the will to stimulate economic activity, grow our economy and create jobs.
tgt_text: sinalo ikhono kanye nentshisekelo yokusungula imisebenzi yezomnotho, sikhulise umnotho wethu futhi sakhe imisebenzi.

src_text: and to do so in the midst of a pandemic.
tgt_text: futhi senze njalo phakathi nalo ubhubhane.

src_text: public finances are under extreme strain, now even more so because of the cost of our health response to covid19 and the social and economic relief measures we put in place to assist businesses and poor households.
tgt_text: izimali zikahulumeni ziphansi kwenkulu ingcindezi, manje kakhulu ngenxa yokubiza kakhulu kwezinsiza zezempilo zokubhekana necovid19 kanye nezinhlelo zokuxhasa ngokwenhlalo nangokomnotho esazibeka ukuze kusizwe amabhizinisi namakhaya antulayo.

src_text: the contraction of the economy also meant that tax revenue has declined significantly.
tgt_text: ukuphazamiseka komnotho futhi kuchaza ukuthi imali yentela yehle ngokubonakalayo.

src_text: there are some parts of the economy that will take longer to recover due to lower global demand generally and restrictions on international travel.
tgt_text: kunezingxenye zomnotho ezizothatha isikhathi eside ukuphinde zivuke futhi ngenxa yokwehla kwesidingo sawo emhlabeni nemikhawulo ebekwe ekuvakasheleni amazwe angaphandle.

src_text: that is why we need to be innovative and focused in our plans to rebuild the economy.
tgt_text: yingakho kumele siqhamuke nezinto ezintsha futhi sigxile ezinhlelweni zethu zokwakha kabusha umnotho.

src_text: significantly, the economic reconstruction and recovery plan that we announced in october last year is based on broad consensus among all social part ners on the actions needed to rebuild the economy.
tgt_text: uhlelo lokwakha kabusha nokuvuselelwa komnotho esalumemezela ngomfumfu ngonyaka owedlule lusekelwe esivumelwaneni phakathi kwabobonke ababambiqhaza emphakathini ezinyathelweni ezidingekayo ukuze kwakhiwe kabusha umnotho.

src_text: this lays a firm basis for effective cooperation that draws on the resources, capabilities and energies of all sections of society.
tgt_text: lokhu kuyisisekelo esiqinile sokusebenzisana ngempumelelo okuholela ezinsizeni, emakhonweni kanye nomdlandla wazo zonke izingxenye zomphakathi.

src_text: we are seeing this in various practical ways.
tgt_text: lokhu sikubona ngezindlela eziningi ezibonakalayo.

src_text: for example, we have been working closely with private funders and multilateral development institutions to prepare infrastructure projects in areas like transport, human settlements, water and telecommunications.
tgt_text: isibonelo, besisebenza ngokusondelana nabaxhasimali abazimele kanye nezikhungo zokuthuthukisa ezahlukahlukene ukulungiselela imisebenzi yezingqalasizinda ezindaweni ezifana nezokuthutha, izindawo zokuhlala abantu, amanzi kanye nezokuxhumana.

src_text: using the infrastructure fund as one of the vehicles, we are developing funding models for these projects that draw on several sources in both the public and private sectors.
tgt_text: ngokusebenzisa uxhasomali lwengqalasizinda ukusa phambili, sisungule izindlela zokuxhasa ngemali le misebenzi edonsa ezindaweni eziningi emikhakheni kahulumeni kanye nezimele.

src_text: this is particularly important at a time when public finances are limited.
tgt_text: lokhu kubaluleke kakhulu esikhathini lapho izimali zikahulumeni zingekho.

src_text: the presidential employment stimulus is another example of partnership in action.
tgt_text: uhlelo lukamongameli lokusungula imisebenzi ngesinye sezibonelo sokusebenzisana osekuqalile.

src_text: understanding that it will take time for economic growth to translate into private sector employment, we have launched the employment stimulus to start creat ing work opportunities now.
tgt_text: ukuqonda ukuthi kuzothatha isikhathi ukuthi ukukhula komnotho kuchazwe njengokusungulwa kwemisebenzi emkhakheni ozimele, sethule uhlelo lokusungula imisebenzi ukuze siqale sakhe amathuba emisebenzi manje.

src_text: this programme is being coordinated from the presiden cy, but is being implemented by a range of government departments and different spheres.
tgt_text: lolu hlelo luhlelwe ehhovisi likamongameli, kodwa luqaliswa ukusebenza iminyango kahulumeni eyehlukene nemikhakha eyehlukene.

src_text: through this programme, tens of thousands of unemployed people are able to both earn and learn as they provide valuable social services.
tgt_text: ngalolu hlelo, amashumi ezinkulungwane zabantu abangasebenzi bayakwazi ukuthola imali nokufunda njengoba behlinzeka ngemisebenzi ebalulekile yomphakathi.

src_text: in time, this programme will include a ‘social employment’ part, where we will partner with other social actors to employ people in a variety of activities – from improving food security, to tackling genderbased violence to upgrading informal settlements – that all contribute to the common good.
tgt_text: ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, lolu hlelo luzobandakanya ingxenye 'yemisebenzi yomphakathi', lapho sizosebenza ngokubambisana nabanye abasebenzi bomphakathi ukuthi baqashe abantu emisebenzini eyehlukene kusuka ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi ukudla kuyatholakala, kuya ekulweni nodlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile kuya ekwenzeni ngcono imijondolo konke lokhu kunegalelo ekwenzeni into eyodwa enhle.

src_text: all this work is being reinforced by an aggressive focus on those economic reforms that will have the greatest focus on growth.
tgt_text: wonke lo msebenzi uqiniswa ngokugxila okukhulu kuzinguquko zomnotho ezizoba nokugxila okukhulu ekukhuleni.

src_text: these include the expansion of electricity generation capacity, making our ports more efficient and competitive, improving access to affordable broadband, and improving turnaround times for water, mining and other licenses.
tgt_text: lokhu kubandakanya ukunwetshwa komthamo wesiphehlimandla sikagesi, ukwenza amachweba ethu asebenze ngokufanele futhi abe sezingeni lokuncintisana, ukuthuthukisa ukufinyelela kuzinsiza zeinthanethi ethengekayo, nokuthuthukisa isikhathi sokuthola izimvume zamanzi, zezimayini kanye nezinye.

src_text: these efforts are being coordinated and monitored jointly by my office and national treasury.
tgt_text: le mizamo ihlelwe futhi ibekwe iso ngokuhlanganyela yihhovisi lami kanye nomgcinimafa kazwelonke.

src_text: there is much to be done in the year ahead.
tgt_text: kuningi okusamele kwenziwe kulo nyaka esibhekene nawo.

src_text: and we should be in no doubt that we will have to confront many daunting challenges.
tgt_text: futhi kumele singangabazi ukuthi kumele sibhekane nezinselele ezisabisayo.

src_text: but we have shown that, as a nation, we are able to succeed when we work together in pursuit of a common purpose.
tgt_text: kodwa sibonisile ukuthi, njengesizwe, siyakwazi ukuphumelela uma sisebenza ngokubambisana ukufeza injongo efanayo.

src_text: if we remember that, and if we put our unity into action, we will ensure that 2021 brings better health and better lives to all our people.
tgt_text: uma sikhumbula lokho, futhi uma sibeka ukubumbana kwethu ekusebenzeni, sizoqinisekisa ukuthi unyaka wezi2021 uletha impilo engcono nezimpilo ezingcono kubobonke abantu bakithi.

src_text: i wish you all the best for the new year.
tgt_text: unyaka wezi2021 ongcono kubantu baseningizimu afrika amaviki okuqala onyaka abe nzima kubo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika.

src_text: an honour to lead the african union vukuzenzele unnamed south africa’s term as chair of the african union has come to an end.
tgt_text: kusho lukhulu ukuhola ubumbano lwamazwe aseafrika (iau) vukuzenzele unnamed isikhathi seni ngizimu afrika njengosihlalo wobumbano lwamazwe aseafrika (iau) sesi phelile.

src_text: as we reflect on our year in this position, i am reminded of the old saying that ‘in crisis lies opportunity’.
tgt_text: njengoba sibhe ka onyakeni wethu sise sikhundleni, ngikhu mbula isisho sakudala esithi ‘kuba mnyama kakhulu uma sekuzosa’.

src_text: ours was a baptism of fire, having assumed the chairship in the same month the first case of coronavirus was reported on the continent.
tgt_text: kowethu unyaka besibhabhadiswa ngomlilo, ukungena esikhundleni sokuba usihlalo ngenyanga eyodwa lapho kwabikwa khona isigameko sokuqala ngqa segciwane lecorona ezwenikazi.

src_text: the priorities we outlined for our term, among them furthering peace and security, the economic empowerment of women and deepening economic integration, had to be immediately and dramatically reoriented to deal with the pandemic.
tgt_text: esasikubeke eqhulwini ngesikhathi sethu, phakathi kwakho ukuqhubekisela phambili ukuthula nokuvikeleka, ukuthuthukiswa kwabesifazane ngokomnotho kanye nokuqinisa ukuhlanganyela kwezomnotho, kwamele ukuthi kuguqulwe ngokuphazima kweso nangokubonakalayo ukuze kubhekanwe nobhubhane.

src_text: our most pressing task was to steer the focus of the african union to addressing the worst global emergency in over a century.
tgt_text: umsebenzi wethu omkhulu kwakungukuthi iau igxile ekubhekaneni nesimo esibi esiphuthumayo somhlaba esesibe khona kwikhulumnyaka.

src_text: covid19 has affected all the countries on the continent.
tgt_text: icovid19 isikhahlameze wonke amazwe ezwenikazi.

src_text: to date there are more than 3.5 million confirmed cases in africa, and more than 88,000 people have died.
tgt_text: kuze kube manje kunezigameko eziqinisekisiwe ezingaphezu kwezigidi ezi3.5 eafrika, futhi bangaphezu kwezi88 000 abantu asebedlule emhlabeni.

src_text: it has been a health, humanitarian, social and economic crisis for african countries, most of whom are inadequately resourced to manage a health emergency of this size.
tgt_text: kube usizi lwezempilo, lokusiza, lwenhlalo kanye nomnotho emazweni aseafrika, amaningi awo angenazo izinsiza zokulawula izimo eziphuthumayo zempilo ezinkulu ngalolu hlobo.

src_text: and yet, as unprecedented as the nature of the pandemic has been, so too has been the manner in which african countries have come together to fight it.
tgt_text: futhi nokho, njengento engakaze ibonwe njengemvelaphi yobhubhane, kanjalo nendlela amazwe aseafrika abumbane ngayo ukulwa nalo.

src_text: in doing so we have drawn principally on the continent’s own expertise, capabilities and institutions such as the africa centres for disease control and prevention (africa cdc).
tgt_text: ngokwenza njalo siveze ubukhulu bobuchwepheshe bezwekazi, amakhono kanye nezikhungo ezifana nezikhungo zaseafrika zokulawula nokuvikelwa kwezifo (iafrica cdc).

src_text: africa did not sit by passively as the true extent and danger of the pandemic unfurled.
tgt_text: iafrika ayigoqanga nje izandla uma ubunjalo nobungozi bobhubhane buvuleka.

src_text: from the earliest days of the pandemic and led by the au, we swiftly developed a continental response strategy, driven by the africa cdc and regional task forces.
tgt_text: kusukela ezinsukwini zokuqala zobhubhane futhi ngokuholwa iau, sasungula ngokushesha iqhingasu lezwekazi lokubhekana nobhubhane, elaliholwa iafrica cdc kanye namathimba ezifunda.

src_text: we realised that every country on the continent would be severely affected by the pandemic.
tgt_text: sabona ukuthi wonke amazwe ezwenikazi azokhahlamezeka kakhulu ngubhubhane.

src_text: most would not have the resources needed to meet the public health challenge or to protect their economies.
tgt_text: amazwe amaningi angeke abe nazo izinsiza ezidingekayo ukumelana nenselele yezempilo yomphakathi noma ukuvikela iminotho yawo.

src_text: we therefore agreed as african countries to appoint several prominent africans as special envoys, who would engage with international funders and multilateral institutions to make the case for financial support and debt relief on africa’s behalf.
tgt_text: ngakhoke sabe sesivumelana njengamazwe aseafrika ukuqoka abantu baseafrika abaningana abaqavile njengezithunywa ezikhethekile, ezizoxoxisana nabaxhasi bamazwe ngamazwe kanye nezikhungo ezahlukahlukene ukuze bezoyokhulumela iafrika ukuze ithole ukwesekwa ngezimali nokusizwa ngezikweletu.

src_text: in this way, working as a one continent, we were able to achieve debt relief for many countries and financial assistance towards our covid response and economic recovery.
tgt_text: ngale ndlela, ukusebenza njengezwekazi elilodwa, sikwazile ukutholela amazwe amaningi usizo ngezikweletu kanye nosizo lwezezimali zokubhekana necovid19 kanye nokuvuselelwa komnotho.

src_text: but much as african countries went to the international community for support, we first helped ourselves – establishing and capitalising a continental covid19 response fund.
tgt_text: kodwa yize amazwe aseafrika aya kumazwe aphesheya kwezilwandle ukuyofuna ukwesekwa, saqala sazisiza thina – ngokusungula nokwenza imali yesikhwama sokubhekana necovid19 sezwekazi.

src_text: for every partnership forged with betterresourced nations and the international donor community, we set up our own innovative and groundbreaking african medical supplies platform to enable all african countries to quickly secure personal protective equipment and other medical supplies in an equitable, affordable manner.
tgt_text: kubo bonke ubudlelwano obenziwe kanzima namazwe anezinsiza ezingcono kakhulu kanye nomphakathi wabaxhasi bamazwe ngamazwe, sisungule inkundla yokusabalalisa izinsiza zokwelapha eafrika entsha sha nengakaze ibonwe ukuvumela ukuthi wonke amazwe aseafrika asheshe athole izinsizakusebenza zokuzivikela nezinye izinsiza zokwelapha ngendlela elinganayo, futhi engabizi.

src_text: and now that the covid19 vaccine is available, we have worked as a collective to ensure that the continent gets its fair share, working with the covax facility and led by our own african vaccine acquisition task team.
tgt_text: futhi manje umgomo wecovid19 usukhona, sisebenze ngokubambisana ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izwekazi liyayithola imigomo yalo ngokufanele, sisebenza nesikhungo icovax nokuholwa ithimba laseafrika eliqinisekisa ukutholwa komgomo.

src_text: vaccine rollout has already commenced on the continent and we aspire to have the majority of the continent’s population vaccinated by the end of 2021 to achieve herd immunity.
tgt_text: ukuqaliswa kokugonywa kwabantu sekuqalile ezwenikazi futhi sifisa ukuba nenanibantu elikhulu ezwenikazi eseligomile uma kuphela unyaka wezi2021 ukuze sizogoma inani elanele labantu.

src_text: we have acted as one to protect health, people and livelihoods on the continent.
tgt_text: sisebenze ngobunye ukuvikela impilo, abantu kanye nendlela yokuziphilisa ezwenikazi.

src_text: in doing so, we have demonstrated our capacity for selfreliance and our ability to be the drivers of our own development.
tgt_text: ngokwenzenjalo, sibonise ukwazi kwethu ukuthembela kithina kanye nekhono lethu lokuba abalawuli bentuthuko yethu.

src_text: despite the dominance of covid19, we have still managed to make advances in several of our key priorities.
tgt_text: ngaphandle kokubusa kwecovid19, sikwazile futhi ukuphumelela kokuningana kwebesikubeke eqhulwini.

src_text: during our term, the africa continental free trade area (afcfta) was finally launched, heralding a new era of intraafrican trade and economic integration.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi sethu, indawo yokuhwebelana mahhala ezwenikazi laseafrika (iafcfta) yethulwa ngokusemthethweni, okwakumemezela inkathi entsha yokuhwebelana ezwenikazi laseafrika kanye nokuhlanganyela kwezomnotho.

src_text: even under the difficult conditions posed by the pandemic, the continent has pushed ahead with towards the goal of ‘silencing the guns’ on the continent.
tgt_text: ngisho nangaphansi kwezimo ezinzima ezidalwe ubhubhane, izwekazi liphokophele phambili nephupho ‘lokuthulisa izibhamu’ ezwenikazi.

src_text: the au has been actively involved in negotiations around the grand ethiopian renaissance dam, in achieving a ceasefire in libya and promoting peace in south sudan.
tgt_text: iau ibilokhu izibandakanye ezingxoxweni ezithinta idamu igrand ethiopian renaissance dam, ukuqeda udlame elibya nokugqugquzela ukuthula esouth sudan.

src_text: another focus of our term has been on the economic empowerment of women, which we will continue to champion even beyond our term and throughout the decade of african women’s financial and economic inclusion to 2030. as we hand over the baton to the democratic republic of congo (drc) we leave this preeminent continental body in a position of greater strength.
tgt_text: okunye ebesigxile kukho ngesikhathi sethu kube ukuthuthukiswa kwabesifazane kwezomnotho, esizoqhubeka nakho ngisho sekudlule isikhathi sethu kuze kwedlulele kwishumi leminyaka lokubandakanywa kwabesifazane kwezezimali nakwezomnotho kuya kunyaka wezi2030.

src_text: south africa will continue to play its part to foster integration on the continent, and support the incoming chair and the organisation in its efforts to meet the aspirations of the au’s agenda 2063. when the organisation for african unity was founded in 1963, member states planted the seeds of cooperation and solidarity in pursuit of a better life for all the peoples of africa.
tgt_text: njengoba sesiphosela idemocratic republic of congo (idrc) izintambo sishiya le nhlangano evelele endaweni enamandla amakhulu.

src_text: they affirmed that african unity was paramount if the welfare and wellbeing of africa’s people was to be assured.
tgt_text: iningizimu afrika izoqhubeka nokudlala indima yayo ukukhulisa ukuhlangana ezwenikazi, nokwesekela usihlalo ozongena nenhlangano emizamweni yayo yokufeza izifiso zeagenda 2063 yeau.

src_text: history bears witness that these seeds have not always fallen on fertile ground, and over the years the continental unity project has experienced many hurdles and false starts.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi inhlangano yobumbano lwamazwe aseafrika isungulwa ngonyaka we1963, amazwe angamalungu atshala imbewu yokusebenzisana nobumbano ukuze kuzozuzwa impilo engcono yabo bonke abantu baseafrika.

src_text: but the grave threat posed by this pandemic has galvanised african countries to collective action.
tgt_text: akuqinisa ukuthi ukubumbana kweafrika kwakubaluleke kakhulu uma inhlalakahle nenhlalonhle yabantu baseafrika kwakumele iqinisekiswe.

src_text: in the hothouse of the covid19 crisis, the seeds of unity and cooperation planted by our pioneering forebears have come to life and flourished.
tgt_text: umlando unobufakazi bokuthi le mbewu ayiwelanga njalo nje emhlabathini ovundile, eminyakeni edlule umsebenzi wobumbano lwezwekazi usubhekane nezithiyo eziningi nokuqala kokusebenza okuyinkohliso.

src_text: this time of great trial and difficulty has been among the au’s finest hours.
tgt_text: kodwa ukufa okulethwe yilolu bhubhane sekushukumise amazwe aseafrika ukuthi asebenze ngokuhlanganyela.

src_text: we are honoured to have been given the opportunity to lead the organisation through this period, when it practically demonstrated the true meaning of the words african union.
tgt_text: kulesi sihogo sosizi lwecovid19, imbewu yobunye nokusebenzisana eyatshalwa izingqalabutho zakithi isiyathela futhi iyachuma.

src_text: this is an accomplishment for which all the citizens of our continent africa should feel proud and from which they should draw encouragement.
tgt_text: kusho lukhulu ukuhola ubumbano lwamazwe aseafrika (iau) vukuzenzele unnamed isikhathi seni ngizimu afrika njengosihlalo wobumbano lwamazwe aseafrika (iau) sesi phelile.

src_text: steps to revive the economy vukuzenzele unnamed it will soon be a year since the first reported case of coronavirus disease (covid19) in our country.
tgt_text: izinyathelo zokuvuselela kabusha umnotho vukuzenzele unnamed akusasele sikha thi esingakanani kuphele unyaka selokhu kwabikwa isigameko sokuqala segciwane lecorona ezweni lakithi.

src_text: the pandemic has come at a great cost to both public health and the livelihoods of millions of our people.
tgt_text: ubhubhane luze nomonakalo omkhulu kwezempilo yomphakathi kanye nendle la yokuziphilisa yezigidi zabantu bakithi.

src_text: many workers lost part of their income as their work hours were reduced with many being retrenched.
tgt_text: baningi abasebenzi aba lahlekelwe imalingeniso njengoba isikhathi sabo sokusebenza sancishiswa kanti iningi labo ladilizwa emsebenzini.

src_text: several businesses have incurred heavy losses from scaledback operations.
tgt_text: amabhizinisi amaningi alahlekelwa ka khulu ngenxa yokusebe nzela emuva.

src_text: others have had to close.
tgt_text: kanti amanye kwadingeka ukuthi avalwe.

src_text: people working in the informal sector have also suffered.
tgt_text: abantu abasebenza emikha kheni engahlelekile nabo bakhahlamezeka kakhulu.

src_text: most difficult of all, the pandemic has claimed the lives of breadwinners in many families, leaving them destitute and fearful for the future.
tgt_text: kodwa okunzima kunakho konke nje, lolu bhubhane seluthathe izimpilo zabantu abondlayo emakhaya amaningi, lwabashiya benga bantulayo futhi baphila ngo kwesaba uma becabanga ngekusasa.

src_text: this is why the extensive relief measures we put in place were both necessary and urgent.
tgt_text: yingakho izinyathelo zosizo esazibeka zazibalulekile futhi zaziphuthuma kakhulu.

src_text: and, now that nearly a year has passed, we can say that these measures have proved effective.
tgt_text: futhi, njengamanje njengoba cishe sekusele kancane nje ukuthi kuphele unyaka, singakusho kugcwale umlomo nje ukuthi lezi zinyathelo zibonise ukusebenza kahle kakhulu.

src_text: of the full package of relief measures that we introduced, perhaps the two measures that had the greatest impact were the special covid19 social relief of distress grant and the unemployment insurance fund's (uif) covid19 temporary employer/employee relief scheme, generally known as covid ters.
tgt_text: ohlelweni olugcwele lwezinyathelo zosizo lwesibonelelo olwethulwa, mhlawumbe izinyathelo ezimbili ezibe nomthelela omkhulu kube yisibonelelo esikhethekile sikahulumeni secovid19 kanye nesibonelelo sesikhashana seco vid19 sokusiza abaqashi nabasebenzi sesikhwama somshwalense wabalahlekelwe ngumsebenzi, ngoku jwayelekile esaziwa njengecovid ters.

src_text: we would not have been able to roll out these measures in such a short space of time if we had not had an extensive social security infrastructure already in place.
tgt_text: besingeke sikwazi uku khipha lezi zinyathelo kulesi sikhashana esifushane uma ngabe besingenayo ingqalasizinda yokuvikelela ko mphakathi ebanzi ebesivele ikhona.

src_text: we were able to respond to this huge and immediate need in our society thanks to the substantial nationwide infrastructure and systems of the south african social security agency and the uif.
tgt_text: kuze kube sikwazile ukubhekana nalesi sidingo esikhulu futhi esiphuthu mayo emphakathini waki thi sibonga ingqalasizinda kazwelonke ekahle yenhla ngano yezimpesheni nezibo nelelo zikahulumeni eningi zimu afrika (isassa) kanye nesikhwama somshwalense wabalahlekelwe ngumsebenzi (iuif).

src_text: there were certainly technical and other glitches along the way, but most of these were speedily resolved.
tgt_text: noma bebukhona ubuxakaxaka kanye nezinye izi nkinga, kodwa iningi lazo lixazululwe ngokushesha.

src_text: these government agencies did outstanding work to enroll millions of new beneficiaries and ensure they were paid.
tgt_text: lawa maejensi kahulumeni enze umsebenzi oncomekayo ekubhaliseni izigidi zabantu abasha abazohlomula futhi aqinisekisa ukuthi bayakhokhelwa.

src_text: the support provided by the uif was a lifeline to struggling businesses and employees.
tgt_text: ukwesekela okuhlinze kwe yiuif kube yiyona ndlela yempilo emabhizinisini adonsa kanzima kanye nabasebenzi.

src_text: it made the difference between companies remaining open and being forced to close, between jobs saved and jobs lost.
tgt_text: kwenze umehluko phakathi kokuthi izinkampani ziqhubeke nokuvula nokuthi ziphoqeleke ukuthi zivale, phakathi kwemisebenzi elondolozekile kanye naleyo egcine ilahleka.

src_text: this benefited businesses like sihle’s brew, a restaurant in gauteng, which was able to retain its 18 employees because of the ters scheme.
tgt_text: la mabhizinisi azuzile njengesihle’s brew, okuyi ndawo yokudlela egauteng, ekwazile ukugcina abasebenzi bayo abayi18 ngenxa yohlelo lweters .

src_text: thanks to government support, mamoshal agae trading and projects, an autoelectrical business in mokopane, was able to pay its workers as well as its rent and rates during the lockdown.
tgt_text: siyabonga ekwesekweni nguhulumeni, inkampani imamoshalagae trading and projects, okuyi bhizinisi lezinto ezisebenza ngogesi emokopane, likwazile ukukhokhela abasebenzi balo ngokunjalo nemali yokuqasha kanye nemali yente la yakamasipala ngesikhathi sokuvalwa kwezwe.

src_text: employees in dire straits were able to receive a portion of their salaries.
tgt_text: abasebenzi abebexinwe ngusizi olukhulu bakwazile ukuthola ingxenyana yomho lo wabo.

src_text: lindiwe ntuli, a paralegal in centurion, has told how receiving her benefits enabled her to work from home and be able to afford her rent.
tgt_text: ulindiwe ntuli, ongummeli wezomthetho ecenturion, uye washo ukuthi ukuhlomula kwakhe kumsize kanja ni ukuthi asebenzele ekhaya futhi akwazi nokukhokha imali yakhe yasemqashweni.

src_text: there are many stories of companies that have been able to stay afloat over the past year because of the support they received from the uif.
tgt_text: ziningi izindaba zezinka mpani ezikwazile ukuqhu beka ngempumelelo nokuse benza onyakeni owedlule ngenxa yokwesekelwa ezikuthole kwiuif.

src_text: the same can be said of the small businesses helped by the various grants and loans provided by a number of departments.
tgt_text: into efanayo ingashiwo ngamabhizinisi asizwe yizibonelelo zikahulumeni ezahlukene kanye nemalimboleko ehlinzekwe yiminyango eminingi.

src_text: these measures greatly helped our people in their time of need.
tgt_text: lezi zinyathelo zibasize kakhulu abantu bakithi ngesikhathi bezidinga kakhulu.

src_text: as we transition from relief to recovery, we have to shift gear.
tgt_text: ekuguqukeni sisuka esigabeni sokudinga usizo siya ekululameni, kumele sishi ntshe ukwenza.

src_text: while these relief measures were designed to be temporary, the economy will continue to feel the effects of the pandemic for some time.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi lezi zinyathelo zosizo zazihlelelwe isikhashana, umnotho usazoqhubeka nokushayeka isikhathi eside ngenxa yalolu bhubhane.
